summary_en: Kete is a tool for simulating all-sky surveys of minor planets, including orbital dynamics and thermal modeling. It can operate on the entire MPC catalog and has been used to simulate NEO Surveyor missions. Key features include predicting visible objects for surveys and calculating close approaches like that of asteroid Apophis. It uses the ICRF reference frame and offers conversion tools and caching.
summary_zh: Kete是一个用于模拟小行星全天巡视的工具，包括轨道动力学和热建模。它可以操作整个MPC目录，并已用于模拟NEO Surveyor任务。主要功能包括预测巡视中可见的物体和计算近距离接近，如小行星阿波菲斯。它使用ICRF参考系，并提供转换工具和缓存。
best_quote_en: Kete can be used to answer many questions, for example, identifying all known asteroids inside of a given image.
best_quote_zh: Kete可以用来回答许多问题，例如，识别给定图像中所有已知的小行星。

title: Oldest surviving Unix language program
summary_en: dc is the oldest surviving Unix language program, a cross-platform reverse-Polish calculator supporting arbitrary-precision arithmetic. Written in B at Bell Labs by Lorinda Cherry and Robert Morris, it predates even the C programming language. It uses a stack-based approach and features terse syntax, registers, strings, and macros. It was the first language to run on Bell Labs' PDP-11.
summary_zh: dc是最古老的Unix语言程序，一个跨平台逆波兰计算器，支持任意精度算术。它由Lorinda Cherry和Robert Morris在贝尔实验室用B语言编写，甚至早于C语言。它使用基于堆栈的方法，并具有简洁的语法、寄存器、字符串和宏。它是第一个在贝尔实验室PDP-11上运行的语言。
best_quote_en: dc is the oldest surviving Unix language program.
best_quote_zh: dc是最古老的Unix语言程序。

title: On Continuous Test Improvement
summary_en: This article discusses Continuous Test Improvement using AI, particularly through agentic workflows. It highlights how AI can significantly enhance software quality by improving test coverage across diverse projects. The author shares an experiment improving test coverage for popular open-source libraries, emphasizing the potential for automatically addressing technical debt and improving software quality with modest investment and guidance.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了使用人工智能进行持续测试改进，特别是通过代理工作流程。它强调了人工智能如何通过提高各种项目的测试覆盖率来显著提高软件质量。作者分享了一项改进流行开源库测试覆盖率的实验，强调了通过适度的投资和指导自动解决技术债务和提高软件质量的潜力。
best_quote_en: Untested software is poison to those who have to deal with it, maintain it, use it over the years.
best_quote_zh: 未经测试的软件对于那些多年来不得不处理、维护和使用它的人来说是毒药。

title: Top Gen AI Consumer Apps 2025
summary_en: The article analyzes the top 100 Gen AI consumer apps in 2025, highlighting the stabilization of the ecosystem. It notes the rise of AI-powered app generation and the performance of leading AI assistants like ChatGPT, Gemini, Grok, and Meta AI. Several Chinese AI apps are prominent on the web list due to restricted access to non-Chinese platforms in China.
summary_zh: 本文分析了2025年排名前100的Gen AI消费者应用程序，强调了生态系统的稳定。文章指出，AI驱动的应用程序生成正在兴起，并分析了ChatGPT、Gemini、Grok和Meta AI等领先AI助手的表现。由于中国对非中国平台的访问受限，一些中国AI应用程序在网络列表中表现突出。
best_quote_en: The ecosystem is starting to stabilize, with 11 new names on the web list driven by traffic increases.
best_quote_zh: 生态系统开始趋于稳定，网络列表中有11个新名字是由流量增长驱动的。

title: Building Semantic Related Posts with Ollama and Astro: A Complete Guide
summary_en: This guide details building an intelligent related posts system using local AI embeddings with Ollama and the bge-large model. It addresses the limitations of traditional tag or date-based systems by understanding the meaning of content and finding semantic connections. The system architecture includes content extraction, preprocessing, embedding generation, similarity calculation, and a caching system for production-ready performance.
summary_zh: 本指南详细介绍了如何使用Ollama和bge-large模型，通过本地AI嵌入构建智能相关帖子系统。它通过理解内容含义并查找语义连接，解决了传统基于标签或日期的系统的局限性。系统架构包括内容提取、预处理、嵌入生成、相似度计算和一个用于生产就绪性能的缓存系统。
best_quote_en: Semantic similarity using embeddings solves these problems by: Understanding conceptual relationships between topics, Finding connections across different writing styles, Discovering subtle thematic links, Working even when posts use different terminology.
best_quote_zh: 使用嵌入的语义相似性通过以下方式解决这些问题：理解主题之间的概念关系，找到不同写作风格之间的联系，发现微妙的主题链接，即使在使用不同术语的帖子中也能工作。

title: Some lesser known but useful CSS features
summary_en: This article introduces several lesser-known but useful CSS features that solve common web development problems elegantly. It covers properties like `accent-color`, `:has()`, `text-wrap: balance`, `scroll-snap-type`, `aspect-ratio`, `overscroll-behavior`, `inset`, and `gap`, providing solutions for styling form controls, parent selection, text balancing, scroll snapping, aspect ratio handling, scroll chaining, element positioning, and item spacing.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了一些鲜为人知但非常有用的 CSS 功能，可以优雅地解决常见的 Web 开发问题。 它涵盖了诸如 `accent-color`，`:has()`，`text-wrap: balance`，`scroll-snap-type`，`aspect-ratio`，`overscroll-behavior`，`inset` 和 `gap` 等属性，为表单控件样式设置，父选择器，文本平衡，滚动捕捉，宽高比处理，滚动链， 元素定位和项目间距提供了解决方案。
best_quote_en: CSS has come a long way from just colors and borders. These days, a few well-chosen properties can replace entire JavaScript libraries, fix annoying layout shifts, and make your stylesheets much cleaner.
best_quote_zh: CSS 已经从简单的颜色和边框发展了很多。现在，一些精心选择的属性可以替代整个 JavaScript 库，修复烦人的布局偏移，并使你的样式表更加简洁。

title: The A1200 NG is a new modern implementation of the A1200
summary_en: The A1200 NG is a new modern implementation of the A1200, featuring classic joystick ports, floppy drive support, HDMI output, and wireless internet. Updated software like OctaMED 8 and AmiBench are included. It offers a blend of classic operation with modern tools for HD video and MP3 music.
summary_zh: A1200 NG 是 A1200 的全新現代化實現，具有經典搖桿端口、軟盤驅動器支持、HDMI 輸出和無線網絡。包含 OctaMED 8 和 AmiBench 等更新的軟件。它融合了經典操作與用於高清视频和 MP3 音乐的現代工具。
best_quote_en: Despite it’s polished looks, it still retains the classic operation and familiar feel of it’s predecessors.
best_quote_zh: 儘管外觀精美，但它仍然保留了其前身的經典操作和熟悉的感覺。

title: AmiBrowser brings 21st century web to 20th century Amigas
summary_en: AmiBrowser brings modern web capabilities to retro Amiga systems using emulation. It runs on AmigaKit's A1200 NG, which uses an Orange Pi Zero 3 and Linux-based emulation with custom Amiga libraries. This setup allows the system to run a modern browser and other applications, taking advantage of faster graphics and processing, all while avoiding copyright issues from original Commodore OSes.
summary_zh: AmiBrowser通过仿真技术将现代网页浏览功能带到经典的Amiga系统。它运行在AmigaKit的A1200 NG上，该系统使用Orange Pi Zero 3和基于Linux的仿真以及定制的Amiga库。这种设置允许系统运行现代浏览器和其他应用程序，利用更快的图形和处理能力，同时避免了原始Commodore操作系统的版权问题。
best_quote_en: Thanks to the raw speed of modern emulation, it's possible to create an Amiga that's thousands of times faster than the original 1980s hardware.
best_quote_zh: 得益于现代仿真技术的原始速度，Amiga的创建速度可以比1980年代的原始硬件快数千倍。

title: Gall's Law
summary_en: Gall's Law states that complex systems that work have evolved from simple systems. Systems designed from scratch rarely work and can't be fixed easily. Start small, test assumptions, and focus on the core before details. Prioritize a conceptual model over the UI to avoid getting bogged down in non-critical issues.
summary_zh: Gall法则指出，有效的复杂系统通常是从简单的系统演变而来。从头设计的复杂系统很少有效，且难以修复。从小处着手，测试假设，并在关注细节前专注于核心。优先考虑概念模型而非用户界面，以避免陷入非关键问题。
best_quote_en: A complex system that works is invariably found to have evolved from a simple system that worked.
best_quote_zh: 一个有效的复杂系统总是从一个有效的简单系统演变而来。

title: Efficient Deep Learning Book
summary_en: This book provides algorithms and techniques for efficient deep learning, focusing on reducing resource usage (model size, latency, training time, data, manual involvement) while improving quality (accuracy, precision, recall). Covering fundamentals and practical know-how, it equips readers to optimize model training and deployment workflows using less resources. The book dives into popular models, infrastructure, and hardware, with projects to test skills.
summary_zh: 本书提供了高效深度学习的算法和技术，重点在于减少资源使用（模型大小、延迟、训练时间、数据、人工参与），同时提高质量（准确性、精度、召回率等）。内容涵盖基础知识和实践技能，旨在帮助读者优化模型训练和部署的工作流程，使用更少的资源。本书深入探讨了流行的模型、基础设施和硬件，并包含项目来测试技能。
best_quote_en: What if you could make your models more efficient: use less resources (model size, latency, training time, data, manual involvement) and deliver better quality (accuracy, precision, recall, etc.).
best_quote_zh: 如果你能让你的模型更有效率：使用更少的资源（模型大小、延迟、训练时间、数据、人工参与）并提供更好的质量（准确性、精度、召回率等），那会怎么样？

title: The Dirty Secret of Coding Agents
summary_en: Coding agents often fail due to 'dirty' context, including outdated or contradictory information. This leads to hallucinations and errors. Managing context like infrastructure is crucial, involving filtering noise, continuous monitoring, and adapting to team practices. Companies prioritizing context engineering will succeed in scaling agents.
summary_zh: 编码智能体经常因为“脏”上下文而失败，这些上下文包含过期或矛盾的信息。这会导致幻觉和错误。像管理基础设施一样管理上下文至关重要，包括过滤噪声、持续监控和适应团队实践。优先考虑上下文工程的公司将成功扩展智能体。
best_quote_en: Your agent isn’t getting dumber. Its memory is getting dirtier.
best_quote_zh: 你的智能体不是变笨了，而是它的记忆变得更脏了。

title: What made the Amiga "Genlock-able"?
summary_en: The Amiga's genlock capability stemmed from two key features: the ability to use an external clock source as the system clock, and the ability to switch the video chip's horizontal and vertical sync pins to inputs from an external source. This allowed the Amiga to synchronize with external video signals, making it suitable for video production.
summary_zh: Amiga的Genlock能力源于两个关键特性：使用外部时钟源作为系统时钟的能力，以及将视频芯片的水平和垂直同步引脚切换为来自外部源的输入的能力。这使得Amiga能够与外部视频信号同步，适用于视频制作。
best_quote_en: That is why the Amiga video chip has a software controllable bit (ERSY in BPLCON0 register) to switch both the HSYNC and VSYNC pins to inputs, so that a device on the video connector can drive the sync signals into video chip which can then generate video according to external sync signals.
best_quote_zh: 这就是为什么Amiga视频芯片有一个软件可控位(BPLCON0寄存器中的ERSY)来切换HSYNC和VSYNC引脚到输入，以便视频连接器上的设备可以将同步信号驱动到视频芯片中，然后视频芯片可以根据外部同步信号生成视频。

title: Situational Awareness: The Decade Ahead (2024)
summary_en: The essay discusses the rapid advancements in AI, particularly the race towards AGI and superintelligence, driven by massive investments in compute power. It highlights the potential for AI to surpass human intelligence within the decade and the associated challenges in security, alignment, and geopolitical competition. The author suggests that the US government will eventually launch a project to control superintelligence.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了人工智能的快速发展，特别是AGI和超智能的竞赛，这背后是由对计算能力的大规模投资驱动的。文章强调了人工智能在本十年内超越人类智能的潜力，以及在安全性、对齐和地缘政治竞争中相关的挑战。作者认为美国政府最终将会启动一个项目来控制超智能。
best_quote_en: By the end of the decade, they will be smarter than you or I; we will have superintelligence, in the true sense of the word.
best_quote_zh: 到本十年末，它们将比你我更聪明；我们将拥有真正意义上的超智能。

title: Threads cast and crew suffered 'trauma' after film
summary_en: A documentary about the making of the nuclear apocalypse film Threads reveals its lasting impact on cast and crew. Many experienced trauma from their involvement, with some even becoming Doomsday preppers. The documentary makers interviewed over 50 people, recording their memories of the film. A remake of Threads is planned, aiming to reflect the even greater potential horrors of a nuclear attack today.
summary_zh: 一部关于核灾难电影《线》的纪录片揭示了该片对演员和工作人员的持久影响。许多人因参与该片而遭受精神创伤，有些人甚至成为了末日准备者。纪录片制作者采访了50多人，记录了他们对这部电影的记忆。计划重拍《线》，旨在反映当今核攻击可能造成的更大恐怖。
best_quote_en: "[Threads] is a film that more than any I can think of everybody who worked on it it has impacted their lives in some way or another. Sometimes very positively and sometimes somewhat negatively."
best_quote_zh: “《线》这部电影比我能想到的任何其他电影都更能影响每一个参与其中的人的生活。有时是非常积极的，有时则有些消极。”

title: Nvidia says two mystery customers accounted for 39% of Q2 revenue
summary_en: Nvidia's Q2 revenue reveals that two customers accounted for 39% of its total revenue. These 'direct' customers, referred to as Customer A and Customer B, are likely OEMs, system integrators, or distributors. While the concentration poses a risk, analysts believe these customers will continue to invest heavily in data centers, benefiting Nvidia.
summary_zh: 英伟达第二季度财报显示，仅两家客户就贡献了总收入的39%。这两家被称为“客户A”和“客户B”的“直接”客户，可能是原始设备制造商、系统集成商或分销商。尽管这种集中度存在风险，但分析师认为这些客户将继续大力投资数据中心，从而使英伟达受益。
best_quote_en: concentration of revenue among such a small group of customers does present a significant risk,” the good news is that “these customers have bountiful cash on hand, generate massive amounts of free cash flow, and are expected to spend lavishly on data centers over the next couple of years.
best_quote_zh: “如此小的一部分客户占据了如此集中的收入，确实存在重大风险”，但好消息是“这些客户手头有大量现金，产生大量自由现金流，并且预计将在未来几年内用于数据中心的支出。

title: How to become an executive at a billion-dollar company
summary_en: This is the story of an Irish man's unconventional career path. From working manual labor jobs to starting a company and becoming a professional songwriter, he eventually lands as an executive at a billion-dollar company, showcasing resilience, adaptability, and continuous learning through diverse experiences.
summary_zh: 这是一个爱尔兰人不落俗套的职业道路的故事。从体力劳动到创业，再到成为一名专业的作曲家，他最终成为一家价值数十亿美元的公司的执行官，展示了在多样化的经验中展现出的韧性、适应性和持续学习。
best_quote_en: Realise that not all the smartest people you will meet in life are in a university — regardless of what your professors seemed to think.
best_quote_zh: 意识到你一生中遇到的最聪明的人并不都在大学里——不管你的教授们怎么想。

title: EM Tools for Python
summary_en: EMerge is a Python project offering free electromagnetic simulation tools. Its goal is to be the easiest to use FEM solver by simplifying implementation options, minimizing dependencies, and providing direct access to simulation data. It allows custom optimization and streamlined pre- and post-processing.
summary_zh: EMerge是一个Python项目，提供免费的电磁仿真工具。其目标是通过简化实现选项、最小化依赖关系并提供对仿真数据的直接访问，成为最易于使用的有限元求解器，从而允许自定义优化和简化的前后处理。
best_quote_en: With EMerge, you have direct access to all the simulation data, making post-processing and visualization as intuitive as any other Python computation.
best_quote_zh: 使用EMerge，您可以直接访问所有仿真数据，使后处理和可视化与任何其他Python计算一样直观。

title: Research roundup: "jelly ice," regenerating snail eyes and more
summary_en: This article summarizes interesting scientific stories, including a 3D digital reconstruction of the Shroud of Turin, plants glowing in different colors via injected phosphors, a shape-changing antenna, and snails that can regenerate their eyeballs. The Shroud of Turin reconstruction suggests it's a medieval forgery, further supported by historical skepticism.
summary_zh: 本文总结了一些有趣的科学故事，包括都灵裹尸布的3D数字重建、通过注入磷光体使植物发出不同颜色的光、一种形状可变的触角，以及能够再生眼球的蜗牛。对都灵裹尸布的重建表明它是一件中世纪的赝品，历史上的怀疑论进一步支持了这一观点。
best_quote_en: It was certainly never draped around an actual body.
best_quote_zh: 它肯定从未包裹过真正的尸体。

title: Marketing Is
summary_en: Marketing, at its core, is a transfer of enthusiasm. When genuine passion fuels your work, it creates a lasting impact – a brand in action. Conversely, insincerity and empty promises lead to distrust. Everything communicates and therefore markets, for better or worse. Even functionality stems from someone's initial care and dedication.
summary_zh: 营销的本质是热情的传递。真正的热情能创造持久的影响，形成动态的品牌。相反，虚伪的承诺会导致不信任。一切都在沟通，因此也在营销，不论好坏。即使是功能性也源于最初的投入和奉献。
best_quote_en: Just like you can't not communicate, you can't not market. Everything is marketing.
best_quote_zh: 正如你无法停止沟通一样，你也无法停止营销。一切皆营销。

title: Convert pixels to inches online for free
summary_en: This free online tool converts pixels to inches easily, supporting image uploads for automatic DPI/PPI detection. It offers separate modes for screens and printers, providing accurate conversions for web design, graphic design, and print preparation. The tool features real-time conversion, copy functionality, and works on all devices without registration.
summary_zh: 这个免费的在线工具可以轻松地将像素转换为英寸，并支持上传图片以自动检测DPI/PPI。它为屏幕和打印机提供单独的模式，为网页设计，图形设计和打印准备提供准确的转换。该工具具有实时转换、复制功能，无需注册即可在所有设备上使用。
best_quote_en: Our free pixel to inch converter is the ultimate tool for designers, developers, and digital professionals.
best_quote_zh: 我们免费的像素到英寸转换器是设计师、开发人员和数字专业人士的终极工具。

title: Good Bye NixOS, Hello Debian (Again)
summary_en: The author details their experience with NixOS, citing difficulties in maintaining configurations and running Python scripts. Despite its advantages, they found NixOS required too much expertise. They switched back to Debian due to Python compatibility issues and difficulties in defining custom setups, finding NixOS unsuitable for their needs.
summary_zh: 作者详细介绍了他们使用NixOS的经验，指出了维护配置和运行Python脚本的困难。尽管NixOS有其优点，但作者认为它需要过多的专业知识。由于Python兼容性问题和定义自定义设置的困难，他们切换回了Debian，发现NixOS不适合他们的需求。
best_quote_en: In my opinion, you really need to become a Nix wizard in order to maintain a system configuration within NixOS. And this is not a weekend project. This seems more like a multi-month or even a lifetime achievement to me.
best_quote_zh: 在我看来，你真的需要成为一个Nix专家才能在NixOS中维护系统配置。这不仅仅是一个周末项目，这似乎更像是一个需要几个月甚至终身才能完成的成就。

title: AI Effect
summary_en: The AI effect describes the phenomenon where AI achievements are dismissed as not 'real' intelligence. When AI solves a problem, it's often seen as just another computation, and the definition of AI or intelligence is adjusted to exclude these accomplishments. AI technologies are integrated into various fields without being explicitly labeled as AI.
summary_zh: “AI效应”指的是人们倾向于将人工智能的成就视为“非真正的”智能。当人工智能解决一个问题时，它通常被看作是另一种计算，并且人工智能或智能的定义被调整为排除这些成就。人工智能技术已集成到各个领域，但未明确标为人工智能。
best_quote_en: It's part of the history of the field of artificial intelligence that every time somebody figured out how to make a computer do something—play good checkers, solve simple but relatively informal problems—there was a chorus of critics to say, 'that's not thinking.'
best_quote_zh: 人工智能领域历史的一部分是，每当有人弄清楚如何让计算机做某事——下好跳棋，解决简单但相对非正式的问题——总会有一群评论家说，‘那不是思考’。

title: Yes, Cash Transfers Work
summary_en: The article discusses the effectiveness of cash transfer programs in alleviating poverty. While some recent studies show limited improvements in mental health, stress levels, and employment, decades of research suggest cash, especially for infants and children, effectively reduces poverty. The author argues that the limited impact of recent programs might be due to their implementation during the pandemic when families received other forms of aid.
summary_zh: 文章探讨了现金转移支付项目在缓解贫困方面的有效性。虽然最近的一些研究表明，这些项目在改善心理健康、缓解压力和促进就业方面的效果有限，但数十年的研究表明，现金，尤其是针对婴幼儿的现金，能够有效减少贫困。作者认为，最近的项目效果有限可能是因为它们在疫情期间实施，当时家庭已经收到了其他形式的援助。
best_quote_en: You give people money; they have money.
best_quote_zh: 你给人们钱，他们就有钱了。

title: TIL: Setting Environment Variables for Pytest
summary_en: This article introduces how to set environment variables for pytest using the pytest-env package. It provides a cleaner and more manageable way than directly modifying os.environ. The configuration is done in pyproject.toml, making tests run in a controlled environment, especially useful for API SDK library testing.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了如何使用 pytest-env 包为 pytest 设置环境变量。与直接修改 os.environ 相比，它提供了一种更简洁、更易于管理的方式。配置在 pyproject.toml 中完成，使测试在受控环境中运行，这对于 API SDK 库测试尤其有用。
best_quote_en: Since a lot of API SDK libraries use environment variables for configuration, this is a great way to ensure your tests run in a controlled environment.
best_quote_zh: 由于许多 API SDK 库使用环境变量进行配置，因此这是确保测试在受控环境中运行的好方法。

title: Apple's Assault on Standards
summary_en: The article critiques Apple's alleged undermining of internet standards through monopolistic practices, impacting interoperability and user power. It emphasizes the importance of voluntary adoption and standardization for fostering competition and preventing vendor dominance, arguing Apple exploits security and privacy as a false front for centralization, damaging open ecosystems and innovation.
summary_zh: 本文批判了苹果公司涉嫌通过垄断行为破坏互联网标准的行为，影响了互操作性和用户权力。文章强调了自愿采用和标准化对于促进竞争和防止供应商主导的重要性，认为苹果利用安全和隐私作为中央集权的不实幌子，损害了开放的生态系统和创新。
best_quote_en: "How can we so organize political institutions that bad or incompetent rulers can be prevented from doing too much damage?"
best_quote_zh: “我们如何才能组织政治制度，使糟糕或无能的统治者无法造成太大的损害？”

title: Contrib Cal: Physical GitHub Contribution Calendar
summary_en: Contrib Cal is a physical GitHub contribution calendar that displays coding activity with LEDs. It's open-source, hackable, and suitable for developers who want to visualize their commit streak, need reminders, or enjoy hardware hacking. Features include a 3D-printed case, customizable LEDs displaying weather, and integrations like Tailscale and Pi-hole.
summary_zh: Contrib Cal是一个实体GitHub贡献日历，通过LED灯显示编码活动。它是开源的、可定制的，适用于想要可视化提交记录、需要提醒或喜欢硬件黑客的开发者。功能包括3D打印外壳、可定制的LED天气显示，以及Tailscale和Pi-hole等集成。
best_quote_en: A glowing, hackable GitHub calendar that transforms your coding activity into a physical light display.
best_quote_zh: 一个发光的、可定制的GitHub日历，将你的编码活动转化为一个实体灯光展示。

title: Ads Are a Positional Good
summary_en: The author argues that advertising is primarily a positional good, where its value lies in having more of it than competitors. Companies spend heavily on ads not to increase overall demand, but to influence consumer choices between brands. This leads to competitive spending that redirect value and harms human attention.
summary_zh: 作者认为广告主要是一种定位商品，其价值在于比竞争对手拥有更多。公司在广告上大量支出并非为了增加整体需求，而是为了影响消费者在品牌之间的选择。这导致了竞争性支出，转移了价值，并损害了人们的注意力。
best_quote_en: While advertising creates some value directly, by informing customers of their options, I think that the bulk of ads is pure competitive value destruction, which redirects surplus value created by productive economic activity to companies hosting advertisement battlegrounds, with human attention being merely a collateral damage.
best_quote_zh: 虽然广告通过告知客户他们的选择而直接创造了一些价值，但我认为大部分广告都是纯粹的竞争性价值破坏，它将生产性经济活动创造的剩余价值转移到主办广告战场的公司，而人类的注意力仅仅是附带损害。

title: Common artificial sweeteners linked to cognitive decline in large study
summary_en: A study found that regular consumption of artificial sweeteners is linked to cognitive decline. Monitoring over 12,000 adults showed those consuming more sweeteners had steeper declines in verbal fluency, memory, and cognition, especially those under 60 or with diabetes. Aspartame, saccharin, and others were implicated, suggesting a need for caution despite being viewed as healthy sugar alternatives.
summary_zh: 一项研究表明，经常食用人造甜味剂与认知能力下降有关。对超过12000名成年人的监测显示，食用更多甜味剂的人在语言流畅性、记忆力和认知方面下降更为明显，尤其是在60岁以下或患有糖尿病的人群中。阿斯巴甜、糖精等被牵涉其中，表明尽管它们被视为健康的糖替代品，仍需谨慎对待。
best_quote_en: Low- and no-calorie sweeteners are often seen as a healthy alternative to sugar, however our findings suggest certain sweeteners may have negative effects on brain health over time.
best_quote_zh: 低热量和无热量甜味剂通常被认为是糖的健康替代品，但我们的研究结果表明，某些甜味剂可能随着时间的推移对大脑健康产生负面影响。

title: Show HN: Super Web Scraper – The Ultimate Data Extraction Tool
desc:
Super Web Scraper is your all-in-one solution for effortless web scraping, lead generation, and data extraction. With just one click, you can extract emails, phone numbers, addresses, images, links, product details, and more from any website. No coding required. Fast, accurate, and powerful.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45124784

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: Super Web Scraper is a one-click solution for web scraping, lead generation, and data extraction. It allows users to extract emails, phone numbers, images, and more from any website without coding. Key features include bulk page scraping, image downloading, and data export to CSV, Excel, or Google Sheets. It supports scraping various data like emails, phone numbers, business details and e-commerce product data, benefitting B2B marketers, sales teams, and researchers.
summary_zh: Super Web Scraper 是一款一键式网页抓取、潜在客户开发和数据提取解决方案。它允许用户无需编码即可从任何网站提取电子邮件、电话号码、图像等。主要功能包括批量页面抓取、图像下载以及将数据导出到 CSV、Excel 或 Google Sheets。它支持抓取各种数据，如电子邮件、电话号码、商业详情和电子商务产品数据，使 B2B 营销人员、销售团队和研究人员受益。
best_quote_en: Supercharge your web scraping, lead generation, and data collection with Super Web Scraper.
best_quote_zh: 使用 Super Web Scraper 加速您的网页抓取、潜在客户开发和数据收集。

title: VLLM: Anatomy of a High-Throughput LLM Inference System
summary_en: This article introduces the core system components and advanced features of a high-throughput LLM inference system, focusing on vLLM. It covers vLLM's engine, advanced features like paged attention and continuous batching, scaling strategies, serving layer, and benchmarking. It suits those interested in LLM engines and contributing to vLLM or SGLang.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了高吞吐量LLM推理系统的核心系统组件和高级功能，重点介绍了vLLM。涵盖了vLLM的引擎，诸如分页注意力和连续批处理之类的高级功能，扩展策略，服务层和基准测试。适用于对LLM引擎感兴趣以及为vLLM或SGLang做出贡献的人。
best_quote_en: The LLM engine is the fundamental building block of vLLM. On its own, it already enables high-throughput inference - but only in an offline setting.
best_quote_zh: LLM引擎是vLLM的基本构建块。就其本身而言，它已经可以实现高吞吐量推理-但仅在离线环境中。

title: A variation of the Secretary Problem to guarantee high reliability
desc:
Hello,

In the Secretary Problem, one tries in a single pass to pick the best candidate of an unknown market. Overall, the approach works well, but can lead to a random result in some cases.

Here is an alternative take that proposes to pick a "pretty good" candidate with high reliability (e.g. 99%), also in a single pass:

https://glat.info/sos99/

Feedback welcome. Also, if you think there is a better place to publish this, suggestions are welcome.

Guillaume

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45124755

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: The author presents an alternative to the Secretary Problem, aiming to select a "pretty good" candidate with high reliability (e.g., 99%) in a single pass. The approach addresses the randomness issue of the original problem. Feedback and suggestions for better publication venues are welcome.
summary_zh: 作者提出了秘书问题的一个变体，旨在通过一次性选择，以高可靠性（例如 99%）选择一个“相当不错的”候选人。该方法解决了原始问题的随机性问题。 欢迎提供反馈和关于更好发布场所的建议。
best_quote_en: Here is an alternative take that proposes to pick a "pretty good" candidate with high reliability (e.g. 99%), also in a single pass.
best_quote_zh: 这里有一个替代方案，建议通过一次性选择，以高可靠性（例如 99%）选择一个“相当不错的”候选人。

title: Agents to Do the Things Claude Can't (With Marimo and Bespoken)
summary_en: This article explores how Marimo notebooks enable reactive programming and dynamic AI interactions, going beyond Claude. It introduces Bespoken for creating customized AI agents tailored to specific tasks. Marimo integrates AI capabilities directly into the notebook. It also highlights the importance of AI safety and addressing risks like prompt injection when using AI agents.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了Marimo笔记本如何实现反应式编程和动态AI交互，超越了Claude。介绍了Bespoken，用于创建针对特定任务定制的AI代理。Marimo将AI功能直接集成到笔记本中。文章还强调了AI安全的重要性，以及在使用AI代理时解决诸如提示注入之类的风险。
best_quote_en: Every talk I give about LLMs needs to end with there is also lots of dangerous stuff here still, right? Like we got to be mindful of that and constraints help, but it's a best it's a remedy. It's not a solution for that problem.
best_quote_zh: 我每次关于LLM的演讲都需要以这样结尾：这里仍然有很多危险的东西，对吧？我们需要注意这一点，约束会有所帮助，但它只是一种补救措施，而不是解决该问题的方法。

title: An Open Letter to Everyone I've Butted Heads With
summary_en: In an open letter, the author reflects on negative interactions related to the Zig programming language project. He attributes these interactions to users' frustration with the lack of agency in choosing technologies and the impact of technology decisions on their careers. He empathizes with users' anger and acknowledges his own shortcomings, expressing a desire to better serve the community.
summary_zh: 作者在一封公开信中反思了与Zig编程语言项目相关的负面互动。他认为这些互动源于用户在技术选择方面缺乏自主性，以及技术决策对他们职业生涯的影响而产生的沮丧。他理解用户的愤怒，并承认了自己的不足，表达了更好地服务社区的愿望。
best_quote_en: Even if I disagree with you, even if I blocked your GitHub account, even if I locked an issue after you made a comment, even if I ignored your pull requests for a long time and then closed them without even a word, I still think that you are not only justified in wanting what you want, you are also justified in feeling angry about not getting it.
best_quote_zh: 即使我不同意你的观点，即使我屏蔽了你的GitHub帐户，即使在你发表评论后我锁定了问题，即使我长期忽略了你的pull request，然后一言不发地关闭了它们，我仍然认为你不仅有理由想要你想要的东西，你也有理由对没有得到它感到愤怒。

title: Show HN: IssuePay Job Offers – Hire developers through their open-source work
desc:
Hi HN,

We’ve been working on IssuePay, a platform where developers get rewarded for contributing to GitHub/GitLab issues, and recently, we've launched a new feature Job Offers.

The idea is simple: instead of only hiring only through CVs or LinkedIn, companies can discover and hire developers based on their actual open-source contributions. On IssuePay, organizations can do just that, it's essentially an ATS, but with extra perks designed for developers and companies.

- Post job opportunities directly to developers. - View candidates’ open-source resume (generated by us based on their Github). - Hire with less friction, since you already know how they code, collaborate, and communicate. - Manage applications in a Kanban-style board. - Send emails to candidates directly from the platform. - Schedule interviews/meetings either in-app or via Google Meet.

For developers, this means your contributions can now lead not just to rewards, but also to career opportunities.

This is still an early version, and I’d love your feedback:

- Does this approach solve a real hiring problem for companies? - What would make the “open-source resume” more valuable or trustworthy to hiring a developer? - Are there features you’d expect in the hiring flow that we’re missing?

Thanks for checking it out—excited to hear your thoughts!

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45136046

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: IssuePay is a platform that connects developers with companies, allowing them to get paid for open-source contributions. It offers various plans including a free option for individual developers, and paid tiers for freelancers and professionals with added features like issue credits, priority support, and access to exclusive events.
summary_zh: IssuePay是一个连接开发者和公司的平台，允许开发者通过开源贡献获得报酬。它提供多种计划，包括面向个人开发者的免费选项，以及面向自由职业者和专业人士的付费等级，这些等级增加了问题积分、优先支持和参与专属活动等功能。
best_quote_en: We make developers earn for what they code!
best_quote_zh: 我们让开发者通过他们编写的代码来赚钱！

title: Fiber Concurrency
summary_en: The `:fiber_concurrency` plugin enables seamless usage of connections across fibers managed by a fiber scheduler, especially for long-lived/persistent connections. It's required by default when using the `:persistent` plugin. This is essential for programs with a fiber scheduler, like those using the `async gem`.
summary_zh: `：fiber_concurrency`插件能够让会话连接无缝地在光纤调度器管理的光纤之间使用，尤其适用于长生命周期/持久连接。 默认情况下，使用`：persistent`插件时需要此插件。 对于使用光纤调度器的程序（如使用`async gem`开发的程序）而言，此插件至关重要。
best_quote_en: The `:fiber_concurrency` plugin enables connections a session to be used seamlessly across fibers managed by a fiber scheduler.
best_quote_zh: `:fiber_concurrency`插件能够让会话连接无缝地在光纤调度器管理的光纤之间使用。

title: When your camera's zoom is an AI illustration
summary_en: The article discusses Google's new "Pro-Res Zoom" feature in Pixel 10 Pro, where AI generates details in zoomed-in photos. This transforms photos into AI illustrations, departing from reality. While smartphones enhance images with processing power, ML models can make the image a computer's interpretation of reality.
summary_zh: 文章讨论了谷歌Pixel 10 Pro中新的“Pro-Res Zoom”功能，该功能通过AI生成照片放大后的细节。这会将照片转化为AI插图，使其脱离现实。虽然智能手机可以通过处理能力增强图像，但机器学习模型可能会使图像成为计算机对现实的解释。
best_quote_en: But it’s important to remember that what you’re seeing, beyond a certain point, is not reality but a computer’s interpretation of what reality probably looked like.
best_quote_zh: 但重要的是要记住，在超过一定限度后，你所看到的不是现实，而是计算机对现实可能样子的解读。

title: From Libraries to Schools: Why Organizations Should Install Privacy Badger
summary_en: Organizations should install Privacy Badger to protect users from online surveillance, reduce cybersecurity threats, and ensure trusted tracker blocking.  It benefits libraries and schools by safeguarding computers and promoting equitable access to private browsing, especially for students vulnerable to data exploitation in Ed Tech.
summary_zh: 各组织应安装 Privacy Badger，以保护用户免受在线监控，降低网络安全威胁，并确保可信的追踪拦截。这尤其有利于图书馆和学校，通过保护计算机和促进公平访问私人浏览，特别是对于在教育技术中容易受到数据剥削的学生。
best_quote_en: All organizations, not just spy agencies, should make ad blocking part of their security strategy.
best_quote_zh: 所有组织，不仅仅是情报机构，都应该把广告拦截作为他们安全策略的一部分。

title: OLMoASR: A series of open speech recognition models (with open datasets)
summary_en: OLMoASR, a family of open ASR models, is released with competitive zero-shot performance. Trained on a curated dataset, it matches or exceeds Whisper's performance, emphasizing data quality. The training pipeline, including data processing and model weights, is open-source, promoting transparency and reproducibility.
summary_zh: OLMoASR是一系列开放的ASR模型，具有竞争力的零样本性能。该模型在一份精心策划的数据集上训练，性能与Whisper相匹配或超过，并强调数据质量的重要性。包括数据处理和模型权重在内的整个训练流程都是开源的，从而提高了透明度和可重复性。
best_quote_en: Data quality is as important as scale.
best_quote_zh: 数据质量与规模同等重要。

title: Ask HN: Those making $500/month on side projects in 2025 – Show and tell
summary_en: This is a recurring 'Ask HN' post, inquiring about individuals earning $500/month from side projects in 2025. It provides links to previous years' discussions on the same topic (2017-2024).
summary_zh: 这是一个重复出现的“Ask HN”帖子，询问在2025年通过副业项目每月赚取500美元的个人。它提供了往年关于同一主题的讨论链接（2017-2024）。
best_quote_en: N/A
best_quote_zh: N/A

title: AkborAli
summary_en: IT and security teams are facing increasing challenges in maintaining control over their digital environments due to the accelerating rate of change and complexity. The connectivity cloud offers a solution by providing a unified platform for secure and seamless connectivity between networks, cloud environments, applications, and users, built on the principles of integration, programmability, intelligence, and simplicity.
summary_zh: 由于变化速度加快和复杂性增加，IT和安全团队在维护对其数字环境的控制方面面临着越来越多的挑战。 连接云通过提供一个统一的平台来解决这个问题，该平台在集成性，可编程性，智能性和简易性原则的基础上，可在网络，云环境，应用程序和用户之间实现安全无缝的连接。
best_quote_en: A connectivity cloud is a new approach for delivering the many services companies need to secure and connect their digital environment.
best_quote_zh: 连接云是一种新的方法，可以提供公司保护和连接其数字环境所需的许多服务。

title: Interactive Silksong map (location spoilers)
summary_en: This article introduces an interactive Silksong map designed to help players explore the kingdom of Pharloom. The map includes locations of bosses, collectibles like mask shards and mossberries, benches, and secret areas. It features filters, search, and shareable links for easy navigation and strategic gameplay, optimizing for both speedrunning and 100% completion.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了一个交互式的《丝之歌》地图，旨在帮助玩家探索法洛姆王国。该地图包括Boss、面具碎片和苔藓浆果等收藏品、长凳和秘密区域的位置。它具有过滤器、搜索和可共享链接，便于导航和战略游戏，优化了速通和100%完成度。
best_quote_en: Mastering Pharloom requires more than just exploring—it demands strategic use of our Silksong map to optimize your progression.
best_quote_zh: 要精通法洛姆，需要的不仅仅是探索，还需要战略性地使用我们的《丝之歌》地图来优化你的进度。

title: Migrating to React Native's New Architecture
summary_en: Shopify successfully migrated its mobile apps to React Native's New Architecture. The migration strategy focused on minimizing code changes, maintaining dual architecture compatibility, and ensuring performance parity. Key steps included dual architecture testing and conditional functionality. They recommend updating to the latest React Native version and addressing common migration issues like state batching and TurboModule errors.
summary_zh: Shopify 成功将其移动应用程序迁移到 React Native 的新架构。迁移策略侧重于最小化代码更改、保持双架构兼容性和确保性能对等。关键步骤包括双架构测试和条件功能。他们建议更新到最新的 React Native 版本，并解决常见的迁移问题，如状态批量处理和 TurboModule 错误。
best_quote_en: Minimize code changes first, refactor later: Make only the minimum necessary code changes to enable the New Architecture. Optimization and refactoring could come after.
best_quote_zh: 首先尽量减少代码更改，稍后再重构：仅进行必要的代码更改以启用新架构。优化和重构可以在之后进行。

title: Infographics for Software Development
summary_en: Software development is the process of designing, coding, testing, and maintaining software, using a systematic approach. It is a broad field covering various disciplines, from API and web development to AI and machine learning. The field includes topics like software architecture, DevOps, and security.
summary_zh: 软件开发是一个系统性的过程，包括设计、编码、测试和维护软件。它是一个广泛的领域，涵盖了从API和Web开发到AI和机器学习等各种学科，还包括软件架构、DevOps和安全等主题。
best_quote_en: Software Development is the process of designing, coding, testing, and maintaining software.
best_quote_zh: 软件开发是一个设计、编码、测试和维护软件的过程。

title: Why Your Resume Gets Rejected in 60 Seconds: Brutal Truths
desc:
Your resume might be stunning—but ATS bots don’t care.

A candidate applied to 113 jobs in 3 months. He had the skills, experience, and a polished design. But he didn’t hear back from even one. Turns out, his resume was being auto-rejected by Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) every single time. No human recruiter ever saw it.

Why? He used columns, graphics, and PDF formatting that the bots couldn’t read. Once he switched to an ATS-friendly version, he got 5 interviews in the first week.

Sound familiar? You might be wasting months of effort—without even realizing it.

This isn’t fear-mongering. It's a brutal truth that job boards and resume tools won’t tell you. If your resume isn't optimized for ATS, you're invisible—even if you're perfect for the job.

Learn how to beat the bots, fix your resume in 10 minutes, and finally get real interviews.

Read the full breakdown here →

Source: https://www.intelligentcv.app/career/ats-resume-rejection-brutal-truth-hack/

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45165651

Points: 2

# Comments: 0
summary_en: Resumes are often rejected quickly due to ATS bots failing to read them because of formatting issues, graphics, or being in PDF format. To avoid this, switch to an ATS-friendly format and focus on clear value, targeted content, and achievement-focused language, also including relevant keywords.
summary_zh: 简历常常因ATS系统无法正确读取而迅速被拒，问题通常在于格式、图片或PDF格式。为避免此情况，应转换成ATS兼容格式，注重清晰的价值、目标内容和以成就为导向的语言，并包含相关关键词。
best_quote_en: If your resume isn't optimized for ATS, you're invisible—even if you're perfect for the job.
best_quote_zh: 如果你的简历没有针对ATS进行优化，即使你非常适合这份工作，你也会变得隐形。

title: Dynamic Pirate Site Blocking Injunctions and the Transparency Illusion
summary_en: The article discusses the issue of transparency in dynamic pirate site blocking injunctions. It highlights the limited transparency in proposed U.S. legislation compared to the broader scale of site-blocking worldwide and uses a recent Indian case involving DAZN to illustrate the potential for global impact and the importance of scrutiny. Site blocking is inevitable, the only question is how and when.
summary_zh: 文章讨论了动态盗版网站封锁禁令的透明度问题。 它强调了美国拟议立法中有限的透明度，并以最近DAZN在印度的案例为例，说明了全球影响的可能性和审查的重要性。网站封锁是不可避免的，唯一的问题是何时以及如何实施。
best_quote_en: Transparency is not an option, it’s absolutely necessary.
best_quote_zh: 透明不是一种选择，而是绝对必要的。

title: X: Today we are open-sourcing the latest code used to recommend posts
summary_en: X (formerly Twitter) announced that they are open-sourcing the code used for recommending posts. The announcement is displayed on a webpage where Javascript is required to function fully, but the core information is that the recommendation algorithms are now publicly available.
summary_zh: X（前身为Twitter）宣布其用于推荐帖子的代码已开源。该公告显示在一个需要JavaScript才能完全运行的网页上，但核心信息是推荐算法现在已公开。
best_quote_en: Today we are open-sourcing the latest code used to recommend posts
best_quote_zh: 今天，我们将开源用于推荐帖子的最新代码

title: Show HN: A music quiz website – guess the singer and song title
desc:
I built a simple web game where players listen to short music clips and try to guess both the singer and the song title. It’s inspired by trivia/quiz games but focused entirely on music recognition. Would love feedback on the gameplay, UI, and ideas for making it more engaging.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45178819

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: Songless is a multiplayer online music guessing game where players guess song titles and artists from short audio clips. It features a 6-level progressive hint system, real-time multiplayer battles, and a leaderboard. The game aims to combine music education, cognitive training, and social interaction, providing an enjoyable and challenging experience for music enthusiasts.
summary_zh: Songless是一款多人在线音乐猜谜游戏，玩家通过简短的音频片段猜测歌曲名和演唱者。它具有6级渐进式提示系统，实时多人对战和排行榜。该游戏旨在结合音乐教育、认知训练和社交互动，为音乐爱好者提供愉快和具有挑战性的体验。
best_quote_en: Starting with super short 0.5-second clips that slowly get longer keeps the challenge just right and helps me fine-tune my musical ear.
best_quote_zh: 从超短的0.5秒片段开始，然后逐渐变长，这样既能保持挑战性，又能帮助我微调我的音乐耳朵。

title: Supreme Court lifts restrictions on LA immigration sweeps
summary_en: The Supreme Court lifted restrictions on immigration sweeps in Los Angeles, allowing federal agents to conduct sweeping immigration operations. This decision favors the Trump administration's policies. Justice Sotomayor dissented, arguing that it erodes constitutional freedoms and subjects people to indignities based on their appearance.
summary_zh: 最高法院解除了对洛杉矶移民搜查的限制，允许联邦探员进行大规模的移民行动。这一裁决有利于特朗普政府的政策。索托马约尔大法官表示异议，认为这侵蚀了宪法自由，并使人们因外貌而遭受侮辱。
best_quote_en: Countless people in the Los Angeles area have been grabbed, thrown to the ground, and handcuffed simply because of their looks, their accents, and the fact they make a living by doing manual labor.
best_quote_zh: 在洛杉矶地区，无数人仅仅因为他们的外貌、口音以及他们以体力劳动为生，就被抓住、扔到地上并戴上手铐。

title: China Energy Transition Review 2025
summary_en: China's rapid expansion of renewable energy and electrification is reshaping global energy trends. Renewables met 84% of China's electricity demand growth in 2024. Fossil fuel use decreased in some sectors. China's leadership in clean energy technology and manufacturing accelerates the global transition, impacting fossil fuel demand and enabling emerging markets to adopt cleaner energy solutions.
summary_zh: 中国的可再生能源和电气化快速发展正在重塑全球能源趋势。2024年，可再生能源满足了中国84%的电力需求增长。部分行业化石燃料用量下降。中国在清洁能源技术和制造领域的领先地位加速了全球能源转型，影响了化石燃料需求，并使新兴市场能够采用更清洁的能源解决方案。
best_quote_en: Through scale, innovation and long-term planning, China is demonstrating that decarbonisation can go hand in hand with industrial upgrading, job creation and improved quality of life.
best_quote_zh: 通过规模化、创新和长期规划，中国正在证明，脱碳可以与产业升级、创造就业和提高生活质量齐头并进。

title: Saylor Model Struggles as Crypto Treasury Hype Turns to Doubt
summary_en: Public firms built to buy crypto are struggling as their stock prices fall and market confidence slips. The "crypto treasury" model, which promised investors a lucrative way into the digital-asset boom, is now under pressure. Shares of digital-asset treasury companies are declining despite a broader market rally.
summary_zh: 旨在购买加密货币的上市公司正面临困境，因为其股价下跌且市场信心下滑。“加密货币财政”模式曾承诺投资者进入数字资产繁荣的有利途径，但现在面临压力。 尽管整体市场反弹，数字资产财政公司的股票仍在下降。
best_quote_en: Increasingly, it’s how, and how quietly, it could fall apart.
best_quote_zh: 越来越多的人关注的是，它会以何种方式，以及多么悄无声息地瓦解。

title: RAG Fails on PDF Tables
summary_en: This article discusses the challenges of using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) on PDF tables, particularly in academic papers. It highlights how OCR performed by VLMs (Vision-Language Models) can struggle with complex layouts. Adding context to tables can significantly improve the accuracy of answers from RAG searches. Converting PDFs into machine-friendly formats like markdown is crucial for effective information retrieval.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了在PDF表格上使用RAG（检索增强生成）所面临的挑战，尤其是在学术论文中。重点强调了VLMs（视觉语言模型）执行的OCR在处理复杂布局时遇到的困难。在表格中添加上下文可以显著提高RAG搜索答案的准确性。将PDF转换为机器友好的格式（如markdown）对于有效的信息检索至关重要。
best_quote_en: Everybody wants to have accurate answers in a RAG search. I would argue that getting accurate answers from a RAG search in an academic context (which could include medical applications for example) is perhaps more important than in most other areas.
best_quote_zh: 每个人都希望在RAG搜索中获得准确的答案。我认为，在学术背景下（例如可能包括医疗应用）从RAG搜索中获得准确的答案可能比在大多数其他领域更重要。

title: Five technological achievements (That we won't see any time soon.)
summary_en: The author argues against several technological advancements being realized by 2050, including manned Mars missions, asteroid mining, commercial fusion power, and a superconductor revolution. He believes these are either too difficult, not economically viable, or overhyped, while expressing optimism about space science and renewable energy.
summary_zh: 作者认为，到2050年，载人火星任务、小行星采矿、商业核聚变发电和超导体革命这几项技术进步将难以实现。他认为这些要么太困难，要么经济上不可行，要么被过度炒作，但同时对太空科学和可再生能源表示乐观。
best_quote_en: But precisely because I take space exploration seriously, I sharply dislike space woo.  Manned trips to Mars are woo.
best_quote_zh: 正因为我认真对待太空探索，所以我非常不喜欢太空玄学。载人火星旅行就是一种玄学。

title: ThreeJS Attractor Maths Visualisation
summary_en: The article explores strange attractors within dynamical systems and chaos theory, using Three.js for visualization. It explains how complex patterns emerge from simple equations, highlighting the beauty of order arising from randomness. It discusses phase space, dynamics, attractors, and the butterfly effect, offering an accessible introduction to these mathematical concepts.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了动力系统和混沌理论中的奇异吸引子，并使用 Three.js 进行可视化。它解释了复杂模式如何从简单的方程式中涌现，突出了从随机性中产生秩序之美。文章讨论了相空间、动力学、吸引子和蝴蝶效应，为这些数学概念提供了一个平易近人的介绍。
best_quote_en: When complexity emerges from three simple equations, when you see something chaotic emerge into beautiful, it's hard not to waste some time.
best_quote_zh: 当复杂性从三个简单的方程式中涌现，当你看到一些混乱的东西演变成美丽的东西时，很难不浪费一些时间。

title: We Rebuilt Our SQL Parser in Rust: 3.3x Faster with Zero-Copy and Better Errors
summary_en: Databend rebuilt its SQL parser in Rust, achieving a 3.3x performance increase with zero-copy and improved error messages. The original parser, sqlparser-rs, became a bottleneck due to limited dialect support, poor error reporting, and high memory usage. The new parser addresses these issues with dynamic dialect support, context-rich error messages, and zero-copy architecture resolving memory problems.
summary_zh: Databend 用 Rust 重建了 SQL 解析器，性能提升了 3.3 倍，实现了零拷贝和改进的错误消息。原解析器 sqlparser-rs 因方言支持有限、错误报告不佳和内存使用率高而成为瓶颈。新的解析器通过动态方言支持、上下文丰富的错误消息和零拷贝架构解决了这些问题。
best_quote_en: The question wasn't whether to optimize - it was whether to fix sqlparser-rs or build our own.
best_quote_zh: 问题不在于是否优化，而在于修复 sqlparser-rs 还是构建我们自己的解析器。

title: Program management update – August 2025 – Inside Rust Blog
summary_en: This August 2025 update covers the Rust Leadership Council's representative selections and their role in the Foundation. It also discusses the election of new Project Directors and addresses the needs of the Bevy game engine, focusing on reflection and variadic generics. The proposed reflection and comptime goal for 2025H2 addresses developer challenges.
summary_zh: 2025年8月的Rust项目管理更新涵盖了Rust领导委员会代表的选举及其在基金会中的作用。同时讨论了新项目主管的选举，并解决了Bevy游戏引擎的需求，重点是反射和可变泛型。提议的2025H2反射和编译时目标旨在解决开发者的挑战。
best_quote_en: The Project is always looking for fresh faces and diverse voices.
best_quote_zh: 项目始终在寻找新鲜的面孔和不同的声音。

title: Xan – CSV preview, filter, slice, aggregate, sort, join; composable commands
summary_en: Xan is a command-line tool, a fork of xsv, designed for efficiently processing large CSV files. It has been heavily rewritten and improved with features like a dynamic scripting language, external sorting, and efficient reverse reading. Xan aims to simplify CSV file manipulation without ad-hoc scripting, making it useful for users who deal with large CSV files.
summary_zh: Xan是一个命令行工具，是xsv的一个分支，旨在有效地处理大型CSV文件。它经过了大量的重写和改进，具有动态脚本语言、外部排序和高效的反向读取等功能。Xan旨在简化CSV文件操作，无需临时脚本，使其对处理大型CSV文件的用户非常有用。
best_quote_en: As a lot of our other tools produce and consume CSV files, it was only natural that we might want to find ways to mangle those files faster and without requiring ad-hoc scripting.
best_quote_zh: 由于我们的许多其他工具都会生成和使用CSV文件，因此我们很自然地希望找到更快地处理这些文件的方法，而无需临时脚本。

title: On discourse and decentralisation
summary_en: The author discusses the discourse surrounding decentralization in the context of social media, particularly Bluesky and ATProto. They advocate for an ethical internet where sense-making tools are not controlled by oligarchs. The author emphasizes that communities owning and controlling their online spaces, as exemplified by Blacksky, is more important than decentralization itself.
summary_zh: 作者讨论了围绕社交媒体去中心化的讨论，特别是Bluesky和ATProto。作者提倡建立一个道德的互联网，让人们用来理解世界的工具不被寡头控制。作者强调，社区拥有和控制他们自己的在线空间，就像Blacksky所展示的那样，比去中心化本身更重要。
best_quote_en: The tools we use in our societies to make sense of the world are in the hands of a few fascist oligarchs, and it turns out that this has pretty bad consequences.
best_quote_zh: 我们用来理解世界的工具掌握在少数法西斯寡头手中，事实证明这会带来非常糟糕的后果。

title: OpenAI says nonprofit parent to own stake in company over $100B
summary_en: OpenAI states its nonprofit parent will oversee the company with over $100 billion equity. Valued at $500 billion, OpenAI partners with Microsoft, who invested over $13 billion. The company faces legal challenges from Elon Musk and is launching a $50 million grant for AI literacy and economic opportunity.
summary_zh: OpenAI声明其非营利母公司将监督公司运作，并拥有超过1000亿美元的股权。OpenAI估值达5000亿美元，并与微软合作，后者已投资超过130亿美元。该公司面临来自埃隆·马斯克的法律挑战，并启动了一项5000万美元的赠款计划，用于支持人工智能知识普及和经济机会。
best_quote_en: "OpenAI started as a nonprofit, remains one today, and will continue to be one – with the nonprofit holding the authority that guides our future,"
best_quote_zh: “OpenAI 最初是一家非营利组织，今天仍然是一家，并将继续是一家——非营利组织拥有指导我们未来的权力。”

title: Recon2012: Reverse engineering of binary programs for custom virtual machines
summary_en: This presentation discusses reverse engineering binary programs for custom virtual machines with secret instruction sets. It proposes heuristics to recover the VM's architecture and instruction set by analyzing the binary code. The method reconstructs the instruction set and identifies elements like subroutines, jumps, and memory access patterns. It also demonstrated the deobfuscation techniques and features of SmartDec decompiler.
summary_zh: 本次演讲讨论了对具有秘密指令集的自定义虚拟机进行二进制程序逆向工程。它提出了通过分析二进制代码来恢复VM的架构和指令集的启发式方法。该方法重构指令集，并识别子程序、跳转和内存访问模式等元素。同时演示了SmartDec反编译器deobfuscation技术和特性。
best_quote_en: Code obfuscation by embedding a virtual machine with a secret instruction set is one of the strongest types of obfuscation.
best_quote_zh: 通过嵌入具有秘密指令集的虚拟机进行代码混淆是最有效的混淆类型之一。

title: VSCode August 2025 (v1.104)
summary_en: The August 2025 release of VS Code (v1.104) introduces features like auto model selection for chat (preview), security enhancements for file edits, support for AGENTS.md files, improved changed files experience, custom chat modes in prompt files, configurable prompt file suggestions, tool set selections, and configurable font used in chat.
summary_zh: VS Code 2025年8月版（v1.104）引入了自动模型选择聊天（预览版）、文件编辑安全增强、AGENTS.md文件支持、改进的更改文件体验、提示文件中的自定义聊天模式、可配置的提示文件建议、工具集选择以及可配置的聊天字体等功能。
best_quote_en: This helps teams surface the right AI workflows at the right time, making custom prompts more discoverable and relevant to your workspace and file type.
best_quote_zh: 这有助于团队在适当的时候展示正确的AI工作流程，使自定义提示更易于发现，并且与您的工作区和文件类型更相关。

title: Show HN
desc:
App running Qwen3-1.7b_q4f16 in browser featuring Bender from Futurama Series

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45230165

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: BenderNet is a chatbot that uses Small Language Models (SLMs) and grammar-based constraints to generate structured output. Built with WebLLM, LangGraph, and Lark Parser, it features Bender from Futurama as a sarcastic AI assistant. It allows natural language queries and provides real-time processing and data visualization.
summary_zh: BenderNet是一个聊天机器人，它使用小型语言模型（SLM）和基于语法的约束来生成结构化输出。它基于WebLLM、LangGraph和Lark Parser构建，以《飞出个未来》中的Bender为原型，提供一个讽刺的AI助手。它支持自然语言查询，并提供实时处理和数据可视化。
best_quote_en: Bender responds with his characteristic sarcasm and attitude: User: "Show me all products" Bender: "Oh great, another meatbag wants to see the whole catalog. Here's your precious data..."
best_quote_zh: Bender以他特有的讽刺和态度回应：用户：“展示我所有产品” Bender：“哦，太好了，又一个肉袋子想看整个目录。这是你宝贵的数据……”

title: Living in a tiny electric van for three years
summary_en: Phil Sturgeon lived in a small electric van for three years. The van, a Nissan E-NV200, helped him continue a fossil fuel-free lifestyle while working for a reforestation charity. He shares the pros and cons of van life, offering advice to those considering it, particularly in the face of housing market challenges. He highlights the benefits of electric vans and solar power.
summary_zh: Phil Sturgeon在一辆小型电动货车里住了三年。这辆日产E-NV200帮助他继续无化石燃料的生活方式，同时为一个重新造林慈善机构工作。他分享了货车生活的优点和缺点，并为那些正在考虑这种生活方式的人提供建议，特别是在面对住房市场挑战时。他强调了电动货车和太阳能的好处。
best_quote_en: People who complain about electric vehicles have 99% of the time never driven one, and it shows in their arguments.
best_quote_zh: 抱怨电动汽车的人99%的时间从未驾驶过电动汽车，这在他们的争论中显而易见。

title: Show HN: CarbonCodeX – AI Coding Assistant Built for Web Developers
summary_en: CarbonCodeX is an AI coding assistant designed for web developers, offering browser-based access to models like Claude, GPT-4, and Gemini Pro. It supports modern web frameworks such as React, Vue, and Next.js, providing features like component generation, API integration, and code debugging. It aims to enhance productivity for web development tasks and offers flexible subscription plans.
summary_zh: CarbonCodeX 是一款专为Web开发者设计的AI编码助手，提供基于浏览器的Claude、GPT-4和Gemini Pro等模型访问。它支持React、Vue和Next.js等现代Web框架，提供组件生成、API集成和代码调试等功能。旨在提高Web开发任务的效率，并提供灵活的订阅计划。
best_quote_en: CarbonCodex has transformed my workflow. Being able to switch between Claude and GPT-4 instantly gives me the best of both worlds.
best_quote_zh: CarbonCodex 已经改变了我的工作流程。能够立即在 Claude 和 GPT-4 之间切换，让我同时拥有了最佳的两者。

title: The Productivity Paradox of AI Coding Assistants
summary_en: The article discusses the productivity paradox of AI coding assistants. While they may feel faster, studies show that experienced developers can be slower when using AI, due to debugging and quality issues. The perception of increased productivity is often a placebo effect. AI is useful for simple tasks, but less so for complex software development.
summary_zh: 文章讨论了AI编码助手的生产力悖论。虽然它们可能感觉更快，但研究表明，有经验的开发者在使用AI时可能会更慢，这归因于调试和质量问题。 提高生产力的感觉通常是一种安慰剂效应。AI适用于简单的任务，但对于复杂的软件开发则不然。
best_quote_en: LLMs give the same feeling of achievement one would get from doing the work themselves, but without any of the heavy lifting.
best_quote_zh: LLM 给人一种自己完成工作同样的成就感，但无需任何繁重的工作。

title: New technology could make oceans transparent and submarines vulnerable
summary_en: Emerging technologies like quantum sensing and AI are accelerating the underwater arms race, potentially making oceans more transparent and submarines, including Australia's Aukus fleet, more vulnerable. These advancements, heavily driven by China, threaten the stealth and effectiveness of nuclear submarines, prompting a re-evaluation of defense strategies.
summary_zh: 量子传感和人工智能等新兴技术正在加速水下军备竞赛，可能使海洋更加透明，包括澳大利亚的Aukus舰队在内的潜艇也更加脆弱。这些进步主要由中国推动，威胁着核潜艇的隐身性和有效性，促使人们重新评估国防战略。
best_quote_en: Could emerging technologies render the last opaque place on Earth – the oceans – transparent?
best_quote_zh: 新兴技术能否让地球上最后一片不透明的地方——海洋——变得透明？

title: Why Most LLM Chatbots Never Make It to Production
summary_en: Most LLM chatbot projects stall before production due to lack of trust from compliance teams and stakeholders, not purely technical issues. Building trust requires benchmarking, strategic data sourcing, targeted fine-tuning, and red teaming. A deliberate playbook focusing on governance and evidence is crucial for success.
summary_zh: 大多数LLM聊天机器人项目在投产前停滞，主要是因为合规团队和利益相关者缺乏信任，而不仅仅是技术问题。建立信任需要基准测试、战略性数据源选择、有针对性的微调和红队测试。侧重于治理和证据的策略是成功的关键。
best_quote_en: The problem is not purely technical...the blocker is not just model quality, it is the lack of trust from compliance teams, risk officers, and business stakeholders.
best_quote_zh: 问题不仅仅是技术性的……障碍不仅仅是模型质量，而是合规团队、风险负责人和业务利益相关者的不信任。

title: Administration to award a no-bid contract on research into vaccines and autism
summary_en: The Trump administration intends to award a no-bid contract to Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute to investigate a potential link between vaccines and autism. Scientists have largely dismissed this link, but the contract raises questions about research priorities and the use of resources, especially when other factors contributing to autism require further investigation.
summary_zh: 特朗普政府计划授予伦斯勒理工学院一份非招标合同，以调查疫苗与自闭症之间可能存在的联系。科学家普遍不认可这种联系，但该合同引发了对研究重点和资源使用的质疑，尤其是在其他导致自闭症的因素需要进一步研究的情况下。
best_quote_en: "The question has been studied for 20 years, multiple times by researchers around the world using millions of people, and there has never been a credible association found between vaccines and autism."
best_quote_zh: “疫苗和自闭症的问题已经被世界各地的研究人员用数百万人的样本研究了20年，但从未发现疫苗和自闭症之间存在可信的关联。”

title: Show HN: Celestial Fortunes – AI Blends Eastern and Western Astrology
desc:
Hi HN — we built Celestial Fortunes, an AI product that synthesizes Eastern traditions (I-Ching, Zi Wei) with Western astrology to produce concise, personalized insights. It’s multilingual (English/中文/繁體) and aims to turn “cosmic wisdom” into practical guidance for life, love, and career. Why Most readings feel generic or siloed. We wanted a single view that compares and reconciles East + West perspectives, then distills them into clear takeaways.

summary_en: Celestial Fortunes uses AI to blend Eastern and Western astrology, offering instant readings and detailed PDF reports. It provides personalized spiritual guidance through birth chart readings, tarot, dream analysis, and auspicious date finding. The platform emphasizes privacy and offers premium features like unlimited access, advanced analysis, and calendar integration.
summary_zh: Celestial Fortunes 使用人工智能融合东方和西方占星术，提供即时解读和详细的 PDF 报告。它通过出生图解读、塔罗牌、梦境分析和吉日查找提供个性化的精神指导。该平台强调隐私，并提供高级功能，如无限访问、高级分析和日历集成。
best_quote_en: Experience the perfect blend of ancient wisdom and cutting-edge AI technology.
best_quote_zh: 体验古代智慧和尖端人工智能技术的完美融合。

title: Ask HN: Voluntary ID verification for better services. Would you use it?
desc:
I've been thinking about the signal-to-noise problem in various online communities. So much of the moderation overhead and user frustration seems to stem from trolling, spam, and bad-faith actors operating behind a shield of complete anonymity.

This is purely a thought experiment, not a product pitch:

If certain services (e.g., marketplace, social-media, a niche forum for professionals, a comments section on a serious publication) offered a strictly voluntary, opt-in "verified" mode, would you use it?

In this scenario, you'd verify your identity once with a trusted third party, and this would grant you access to these higher-trust spaces. Your real name would not necessarily be public, but your account would be linked to a unique, real person.

The theoretical benefit would be a dramatic reduction in scams, spam, and trolling, leading to a higher quality of interaction. The obvious downside is the privacy trade-off.

Would you ever consider making that trade? If so, under what specific conditions?

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45247206

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: The author proposes a voluntary ID verification system for online services to reduce trolling, spam, and scams. Users would verify their identity with a trusted third party for access to higher-trust spaces, without necessarily revealing their real name publicly. The trade-off would be improved interaction quality versus privacy concerns.
summary_zh: 作者提出了一个在线服务自愿身份验证系统，以减少网络暴力、垃圾邮件和诈骗。用户将通过受信任的第三方验证其身份，以访问更高信任度的空间，而不必公开其真实姓名。权衡之处在于交互质量的提高与隐私问题。
best_quote_en: So much of the moderation overhead and user frustration seems to stem from trolling, spam, and bad-faith actors operating behind a shield of complete anonymity.
best_quote_zh: 如此多的管理负担和用户沮丧似乎源于在完全匿名保护下进行的网络暴力、垃圾邮件和恶意行为者。

title: The OpenRouter for OCR
summary_en: Parser Studio is presented as an open platform for OCR and document extraction. It simplifies the process by allowing users to choose the best OCR and extraction engines based on their priorities (speed, cost). It aims to unify document processing workflows, boost efficiency, and cut expenses, acting as a single router for developers to manage various file types.
summary_zh: Parser Studio 是一个开放的OCR和文档提取平台。它通过允许用户根据优先级（速度、成本）选择最佳的OCR和提取引擎来简化流程。它旨在统一文档处理工作流程，提高效率并削减开支，作为一个单一的路由器供开发人员管理各种文件类型。
best_quote_en: Parser Studio aims to be the simple router developers need to make sense of documents.
best_quote_zh: Parser Studio 旨在成为开发者理解文档所需的简单路由器。

title: Network Breakthrough: GNN-Pomdp Enables Robust Policies in Dynamic Systems
summary_en: Researchers developed a GNN-POMDP framework for robust routing in dynamic quantum networks. This approach encodes network dynamics into simplified representations, accounts for noise and decoherence, and intelligently manages quantum information flow. It combines the scalability of GNNs with the formal guarantees of POMDPs, achieving fidelity tracking and resource management while adapting to changing network conditions.
summary_zh: 研究人员开发了一个GNN-POMDP框架，用于在动态量子网络中实现稳健的路由。该方法将网络动态编码为简化的表示，考虑了噪声和退相干，并智能地管理量子信息流。它结合了GNN的可扩展性和POMDP的形式保证，实现了保真度跟踪和资源管理，同时适应不断变化的网络条件。
best_quote_en: This hybrid algorithm leverages the formal guarantees of belief-state planning alongside the scalability of GNNs, achieving a synergistic combination of robustness and efficiency.
best_quote_zh: 这种混合算法利用了置信状态规划的形式保证以及GNN的可扩展性，实现了鲁棒性和效率的协同结合。

title: Dolphin Progress Release 2509
summary_en: This Dolphin Progress Report discusses disabling Dual Core mode by default on desktop due to its instability, while it remains enabled on Android. It also touches on improvements to DSP-LLE and the ongoing efforts to support Nintendo Switch 2 NSO GameCube Controller. The report highlights challenges in emulating games like Star Wars: Rogue Squadron and the 'Disney Trio of Destruction'.
summary_zh: Dolphin进度报告讨论了由于Dual Core模式的不稳定性，默认情况下在桌面端禁用它，但在Android端仍然启用。报告还涉及对DSP-LLE的改进以及支持Nintendo Switch 2 NSO GameCube Controller的持续努力。报告强调了模拟《星球大战：侠盗中队》和“迪士尼毁灭三人组”等游戏的挑战。
best_quote_en: We'd much rather have users mutter about Dolphin being slower than be heartbroken over lost save data caused by a setting they didn't even realize existed.
best_quote_zh: 我们宁愿用户抱怨 Dolphin 变慢，也不愿他们因为一个他们甚至不知道存在的设置而丢失存档数据而伤心。

title: Eggcorn
summary_en: An eggcorn is the alteration of a word or phrase based on mishearing or reinterpretation, creating a plausible new phrase. It's a fitting malapropism arising from attempts to make sense of unfamiliar terms. Linguists find them interesting because they reveal how language changes in real-time.
summary_zh: Eggcorn是通过误听或重新解释来改变单词或短语，从而创建一个看似合理的新短语。这是一种恰当的用词错误，源于试图理解不熟悉的术语。语言学家认为它们很有趣，因为它们揭示了语言如何实时变化。
best_quote_en: Eggcorns are of interest to linguists as they not only show language changing in real time, but can also shed light on how and why the change occurs.
best_quote_zh: Eggcorns之所以引起语言学家的兴趣，不仅因为它们展示了语言的实时变化，而且还可以阐明这种变化是如何以及为何发生的。

title: S1ngularity – What Happened, How We Responded, What We Learned
summary_en: On August 26, 2025, Nx packages on npm were compromised due to a GitHub Actions injection vulnerability. Attackers stole the NPM token, published malicious packages, and scanned user systems for data. The issue was contained by removing tokens and packages. Affected users were identified and alerted. Security measures like NPM Trusted Publishers and access hardening were implemented to prevent future attacks.
summary_zh: 2025年8月26日，由于 GitHub Actions 注入漏洞，npm 上的 Nx 包遭到入侵。攻击者窃取了NPM令牌，发布了恶意软件包，并扫描用户系统以获取数据。通过删除令牌和软件包来控制了问题。已识别并提醒受影响的用户。已实施 NPM Trusted Publishers 和访问权限强化等安全措施，以防止未来的攻击。
best_quote_en: Our publishing process itself wasn’t breached, but the token let attackers bypass release pipelines.
best_quote_zh: 我们的发布流程本身没有被破坏，但令牌让攻击者绕过了发布管道。

title: Book Review: If Anyone Builds It, Everyone Dies
summary_en: The Machine Intelligence Research Institute (MIRI) advocates for an immediate ban on AI capabilities research, believing that AI poses a significant existential risk to humanity. They criticize the incrementalist approach of other AI safety organizations, arguing that it is insufficient to address the potential dangers. MIRI's upcoming book, 'If Anyone Builds It, Everyone Dies', presents this case.
summary_zh: 机器智能研究所（MIRI）主张立即禁止人工智能能力研究，认为人工智能对人类构成重大的生存风险。他们批评其他人工智能安全组织采取的渐进主义方法，认为这不足以解决潜在的危险。MIRI即将出版的书籍《如果任何人构建它，每个人都会死》提出了这一观点。
best_quote_en: MIRI answered: moral clarity.
best_quote_zh: 机器智能研究所的回答是：道德清晰。

title: Harvest Now, Decrypt Later
summary_en: "Harvest now, decrypt later" is a surveillance strategy involving the long-term storage of encrypted data, anticipating future decryption breakthroughs. Quantum computing poses a major threat, potentially breaking current encryption. The U.S. government is proactively urging migration to post-quantum cryptography to safeguard sensitive data.
summary_zh: “先收集，后解密”是一种监视策略，涉及长期存储加密数据，以期未来出现解密技术突破。量子计算构成重大威胁，可能破解当前的加密技术。美国政府正积极推动迁移到后量子密码学，以保护敏感数据。
best_quote_en: The existence of this strategy has led to concerns about the need to urgently deploy post-quantum cryptography, even though no practical quantum attacks yet exist, as some data stored now may still remain sensitive even decades into the future.
best_quote_zh: 这种策略的存在导致人们担心需要紧急部署后量子密码学，即使目前还没有实际的量子攻击，因为现在存储的一些数据在几十年后可能仍然敏感。

title: Codegen Scorer – evaluate the quality of code generated by LLMs
summary_en: Web Codegen Scorer is a tool for evaluating the quality of web code generated by Large Language Models (LLMs). It allows users to iterate on system prompts, compare code quality, and monitor generated code over time. It offers built-in checks for build success, runtime errors, accessibility, security, LLM rating, and coding best practices.  It supports various models, frameworks, and tools and provides an intuitive report viewer UI.
summary_zh: Web Codegen Scorer 是一个评估大型语言模型 (LLM) 生成的 Web 代码质量的工具。它允许用户迭代系统提示，比较代码质量，并随时间监控生成的代码。它提供内置检查，用于构建成功、运行时错误、可访问性、安全性、LLM 评级和编码最佳实践。它支持各种模型、框架和工具，并提供直观的报告查看器 UI。
best_quote_en: Web Codegen Scorer is different from other code benchmarks in that it focuses specifically on web code and relies primarily on well-established measures of code quality.
best_quote_zh: Web Codegen Scorer 与其他代码基准的不同之处在于，它专门关注 Web 代码，并且主要依赖于公认的代码质量衡量标准。

title: Scientists find that ice generates electricity when bent
summary_en: Scientists discovered that ice is a flexoelectric material, generating electricity when unevenly deformed. This finding, published in Nature Physics, could impact technology and explain lightning formation. Ice generates electric charge from mechanical stress and has a ferroelectric surface layer below -113°C. Flexoelectricity in ice could explain cloud electrification during thunderstorms, potentially leading to new electronic devices using ice.
summary_zh: 科学家发现冰是一种挠曲电材料，当不均匀变形时会产生电流。这项发表在《自然物理》上的发现可能会影响技术并解释闪电的形成。冰通过机械应力产生电荷，并在-113°C以下具有铁电表面层。冰中的挠曲电现象可以解释雷暴期间云的带电，并可能导致使用冰的新型电子设备的开发。
best_quote_en: "We discovered that ice generates electric charge in response to mechanical stress at all temperatures."
best_quote_zh: “我们发现冰在所有温度下都会响应机械应力而产生电荷。”

title: Our AI policy vs. code of conduct and vs. reality
summary_en: The author used AI to write 98% of the code, except for the documentation. The author is still learning to remove useless comments and understanding how llvm/compilers work in general.
summary_zh: 作者使用了AI编写了98%的代码，除了文档部分。作者仍在学习如何删除无用的注释，并理解llvm/编译器的工作原理。
best_quote_en: I coded 98% of this with AI (except for the `.rst` documentation text which I mostly wrote myself).
best_quote_zh: 我用AI编写了98%的代码(除了我自己编写的`.rst`文档文本)。

title: Building a North American EV Charging Standard: The Moment of Truth
summary_en: North America has an opportunity to establish a reliable EV charging standard. Automakers are converging on NACS, federal funding mandates reliability, and heavy-duty trucking drives demand for megawatt charging. Addressing fragmentation now is crucial for meeting 2030 EV adoption targets and avoiding an unreliable system.
summary_zh: 北美有机会建立可靠的电动汽车充电标准。汽车制造商正趋同于NACS，联邦资金要求可靠性，重型卡车运输推动了兆瓦充电的需求。现在解决碎片化问题对于实现2030年电动汽车普及目标和避免不可靠的系统至关重要。
best_quote_en: North America has the chance to build a charging ecosystem that drivers and fleets can trust as much as a gas pump—and the clock is ticking.
best_quote_zh: 北美有机会建立一个充电生态系统，让司机和车队像信任加油站一样信任它——而且时间正在流逝。

title: Steering Committee Retrospective
summary_en: The author is resigning early from the Steering Committee due to its ineffectiveness. Issues include its large size leading to diffusion of responsibility and stagnation, timidity hindering consensus, poor self-organization and internal policies like requiring majority approval for statements causing delayed responses, and absenteeism. The author hopes for reforms to address the committee's stagnation.
summary_zh: 作者因指导委员会效率低下而提前辞职。问题包括规模过大导致责任分散和停滞，胆怯阻碍共识，糟糕的自我组织和内部政策（如要求声明获得多数批准导致回应延迟）以及缺勤。作者希望进行改革以解决委员会的停滞状态。
best_quote_en: I believe the Steering Committee is in need of reform in order to be effective and in its present state it does not set up the Nix community for success nor does it set up individual Steering Committee members for success.
best_quote_zh: 我认为指导委员会需要改革才能有效，并且以目前的状态，它既没有为 Nix 社区的成功做好准备，也没有为指导委员会成员个人的成功做好准备。

title: What you should do if you suddenly can't pee
summary_en: Difficulty urinating can stem from urinary retention, blockages, weak bladder muscles, or nerve issues. Common causes include enlarged prostate in men, constipation, medications, and neurological conditions. Warning signs include inability to urinate or a weak stream. Urologists use various tests to diagnose the cause, such as uroflowmetry and cystoscopy. Prompt treatment is essential to prevent complications.
summary_zh: 排尿困难可能源于尿潴留、阻塞、膀胱肌肉无力或神经问题。常见原因包括男性前列腺增大、便秘、药物和神经系统疾病。警告信号包括无法排尿或尿流较弱。泌尿科医生使用多种检查来诊断病因，例如尿流动力学和膀胱镜检查。及时治疗对于预防并发症至关重要。
best_quote_en: If you cannot urinate at all and your bladder feels painfully full...that’s likely an emergency. Go to the ER right away.
best_quote_zh: 如果你完全无法排尿，并且膀胱感到疼痛地充满...这可能就是紧急情况。马上去急诊室。

title: Ask HN: macOS+AWS Workspace+Bluetooth sucks: dongle headphone recommendations?
desc:
Following Apple basically giving up on fixing the Bluetooth audio mode switching ([1]), and AWS Workspace being a very frustrating piece of software on Mac OS, I am forced to consider giving up my beloved original Bose QC 35 (Bluetooth and ANC).

I have to work in AWS Workspaces, which has the habit of needlessly forcing the use of the microphone at all times (yellow icon in the menubar). This makes Mac OS change the Bluetooth profile from audio playback to handset mode, which is extremely low quality audio (and on my headphones pipes the headphones mic back in the audio and seemingly disable the noise cancellation). The tools to deactivate the profile was removed 3 version of Mac OS ago and changing the selected microphone in the settings does nothing.

As they don't suffer from the same problem, I am looking for dongle-based over ear headphones like the Logitech G 735. In order criteria are: "works with mac os", over the ear, comfortable, good audio, ANC, low latency, mic optional but a nice microphone a plus.

After endless frustrating google searches it seems only Logitech advertise Mac OS support on some of their headphones. Most tests or reviews don't mention mac os, and I think most of the dongle based headphones that "support" mac os is through the Bluetooth, which is a no-go for my use case.

- G735 work, sound OK but they feel a bit heavy and basically no noise isolation (also not inexpensive). - G733 should work with Mac OS, be lighter than G 735, but worse sound, isolation and latency (at least they seem relatively inexpensive) - G533 also should work, be light as well, but same problems and worse sound, isolation and latency (also available relatively inexpensive) - G Pro X2: should sound better, but Mac OS status is unknown

Anybody has good Mac OS experience with the above headphones or the Razer BlackShark series (the last one has ANC) ? Or able to recommend another pair?

1: https://support.apple.com/en-us/102217 : "If sound quality is reduced when using Bluetooth headphones with your Mac Quit any apps that use your Bluetooth headphones' built-in microphone, then try your audio again." : unfortunately I can't quit AWS Workspace.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45286822

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: The author is frustrated with Bluetooth audio issues on macOS when using AWS Workspace, specifically the automatic switching to low-quality handset mode due to constant microphone usage. They are seeking recommendations for dongle-based over-ear headphones with macOS support, good audio, ANC, low latency, and optional mic, considering options like Logitech G735, G733, G533, and G Pro X2, or Razer BlackShark series.
summary_zh: 作者对在macOS上使用AWS Workspace时遇到的蓝牙音频问题感到沮丧，特别是由于持续的麦克风使用而自动切换到低质量的手机模式。他们正在寻找支持macOS的，基于dongle的头戴式耳机，要求具有良好的音频，主动降噪（ANC），低延迟和可选麦克风，并正在考虑Logitech G735，G733，G533和G Pro X2或Razer BlackShark系列等选项。
best_quote_en: I have to work in AWS Workspaces, which has the habit of needlessly forcing the use of the microphone at all times (yellow icon in the menubar). This makes Mac OS change the Bluetooth profile from audio playback to handset mode, which is extremely low quality audio (and on my headphones pipes the headphones mic back in the audio and seemingly disable the noise cancellation).
best_quote_zh: 我必须在AWS Workspaces中工作，它总是习惯性地不必要地强制使用麦克风（菜单栏中的黄色图标）。这使得Mac OS将蓝牙配置文件从音频播放更改为手机模式，这导致极低的音频质量（并且在我的耳机上，会将耳机麦克风重新导入到音频中，并且似乎禁用了降噪功能）。

title: SlamDunk for 3D Visualizations in Python
summary_en: SlamDunk is a user-friendly Python library for creating 3D and 2D visualizations, ideal for prototyping, data exploration, and algorithm development. It leverages OpenGL and ImGui for lightweight operation. The client-server architecture allows remote visualization. It supports various geometry primitives such as point clouds and meshes.
summary_zh: SlamDunk 是一个用户友好的 Python 库，用于创建 3D 和 2D 可视化，非常适合原型设计、数据探索和算法开发。它利用 OpenGL 和 ImGui 实现轻量级操作。客户端-服务器架构允许远程可视化。 它支持各种几何图元，如点云和网格。
best_quote_en: SlamDunk is a powerful and user-friendly Python library for making 3D and 2D visualizations for prototyping, data exploration, and algorithm development.
best_quote_zh: SlamDunk 是一个强大且用户友好的 Python 库，用于创建 3D 和 2D 可视化，非常适合原型设计、数据探索和算法开发。

title: Council to introduce facial recognition CCTV
summary_en: Hammersmith and Fulham Council approved facial recognition and AI-assisted CCTV with over Â£3m funding. Cameras will match faces against police databases, raising privacy concerns. The council aims to improve criminal justice, citing austerity's impact. Big Brother Watch criticizes the lack of safeguards and mass surveillance.
summary_zh: 哈默史密斯和富勒姆委员会批准了面部识别和人工智能辅助的闭路电视系统，并投入超过300万英镑的资金。摄像头会将面部与警方数据库进行匹配，引发了对隐私的担忧。委员会的目标是改善刑事司法，理由是紧缩政策的影响。老大哥观察组织批评缺乏保障措施和大规模监控。
best_quote_en: The use of facial recognition proposed by the council amounted to 'an unprecedented level of mass surveillance and it marks the end of privacy in the public space as we know it'.
best_quote_zh: 委员会提出的面部识别技术的使用，相当于'前所未有的大规模监控，标志着我们所知的公共空间隐私的终结'。

title: Intel says blockbuster Nvidia deal doesn't change its own roadmap
summary_en: Intel claims its deal with Nvidia won't impact its existing product roadmap for CPUs, including Panther Lake and Nova Lake. The Nvidia partnership may add premium products to Intel's lineup, potentially integrating Nvidia's RTX chiplets. While the future of Intel's Arc graphics is uncertain, Intel insists it will continue GPU offerings.
summary_zh: 英特尔声明与英伟达的合作不会影响现有的CPU产品路线图，包括Panther Lake和Nova Lake。与英伟达的合作可能会为英特尔的产品线增加高端产品，可能集成英伟达的RTX芯片。虽然英特尔Arc显卡的未来尚不确定，但英特尔坚持将继续提供GPU产品。
best_quote_en: We’re not discussing specific roadmaps at this time, but the collaboration is complementary to Intel’s roadmap and Intel will continue to have GPU product offerings.
best_quote_zh: 目前我们不讨论具体的产品规划，但这次合作是对英特尔产品规划的补充，英特尔将继续提供GPU产品。

title: Show HN: TermChat – Terminal chat (rooms/DMs) via SSH
desc:
Hello,

I got an idea from a friend a couple of weeks ago when we were discussing how heavy simple apps have become with all their unnecessary features. If you only want to communicate via good old text, you almost certainly need to install some kind of heavy and often slow desktop app. We talked about how cool it would be to just use your terminal without any dependencies. So I got the idea to create a simple chat app, but instead of making YAA (yet another app), why not use something almost all people already have installed on their PCs - SSH? So TermChat was born.

Simply type: ssh termchat.me

then: /help to see all the available commands or /register and then /login.

Switch panes via tab, navigate by 'hjkl' or arrows.

It’s still early days, so there will be (are) bugs and hiccups but the basics work: public/private rooms, notifications, and DMs.

There are no email registration/verification etc. It's simple username/password registration. Passwords are hashed and salted, private rooms and chats are encrypted at rest.

I'm working with code cleanup and docs. now and planning to open source it soon.

Feedback, critique or anything that could help me improve this project are welcome. My main reason for creating this was that I just want to communicate with people via simple text with tools I already have on my computer.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45299005

Points: 1

summary_en: TermChat is a terminal-based chat application accessible via SSH. It aims to provide a lightweight alternative to feature-heavy chat apps, leveraging the ubiquity of SSH. The application supports public/private rooms, DMs, and username/password registration with hashed passwords. Open-sourcing is planned.
summary_zh: TermChat是一个基于终端的聊天应用程序，可通过SSH访问。它的目标是提供一个轻量级的替代方案，以取代功能繁重的聊天应用程序，并利用SSH的普遍性。该应用支持公共/私人聊天室、私信，以及用户名/密码注册（密码已哈希处理）。计划开源。
best_quote_en: My main reason for creating this was that I just want to communicate with people via simple text with tools I already have on my computer.
best_quote_zh: 我创建这个的主要原因是，我只想用我电脑上已有的工具，通过简单的文本与人交流。

title: JEP 500: Prepare to Make Final Mean Final
summary_en: JEP 500 proposes issuing warnings for deep reflection-based mutations of final fields, preparing for a future release that enforces immutability by default. This aims to improve safety and performance by aligning final fields with record classes and allowing serialization libraries to function. The goal is to prevent reassignment via deep reflection, enhancing integrity and enabling better JVM optimizations.
summary_zh: JEP 500 提议针对基于深度反射的 final 字段突变发出警告，为将来默认强制执行不变性的版本做准备。这旨在通过使 final 字段与 record 类保持一致并允许序列化库发挥作用，来提高安全性和性能。目标是防止通过深度反射重新赋值，从而增强完整性并实现更好的 JVM 优化。
best_quote_en: Final fields are, in reality, as mutable as non-final fields. We cannot rely on final fields to be immutable when reasoning about correctness, and we cannot use final fields to construct the deeply immutable graphs of objects that enable the JVM to deliver the best performance optimizations.
best_quote_zh: 实际上，Final 字段与非 Final 字段一样可变。在推理正确性时，我们不能依赖 Final 字段的不可变性，也不能使用 Final 字段来构建深度不可变的对象图，而这些对象图使 JVM 能够提供最佳的性能优化。

title: Euclidea – Geometric Constructions Game with Straightedge and Compass
summary_en: Euclidea is a geometric construction game using straightedge and compass, offering 120 levels from easy to hard. It focuses on building geometric constructions in a fun and simple way, rewarding elegant solutions with high scores. The game features tutorials, innovative tools and dynamic geometry, with interactive practice. Other similar applications such as Pythagorea and Tchisla are developed.
summary_zh: Euclidea是一款使用直尺和圆规进行几何构造的游戏，提供120个从易到难的关卡。 它注重以有趣和简单的方式构建几何图形，并以高分奖励优雅的解决方案。该游戏具有教程，创新工具和动态几何功能，可以进行交互式练习。 开发了其他类似的应用程序，例如Pythagorea和Tchisla。
best_quote_en: Find the most elegant solution — the one, which is built in the least possible moves, — and you’ll get the highest score.
best_quote_zh: 找到最优雅的解决方案——以尽可能少的步骤构建的方案——你将获得最高分。

best_quote_zh: 在《Grow a Garden》中，每一个决定都很重要，从选择种植哪种种子到决定繁殖哪种生物。
