title: The "Corrupted Blood" Incident (Wow, 2005)
summary_en: The Corrupted Blood incident was a virtual pandemic in World of Warcraft in 2005 caused by a debuff spreading beyond its intended game region. It started in Zul'Gurub and spread due to a programming oversight, affecting players and NPCs. The event gained attention from epidemiologists for its simulation of human responses to disease outbreaks.
summary_zh: “堕落之血”事件是2005年《魔兽世界》中的一场虚拟瘟疫，起因是一个Debuff（减益效果）扩散到游戏区域之外。它始于祖尔格拉布，并由于编程失误而蔓延，影响了玩家和NPC。该事件引起了流行病学家的关注，因为它模拟了人类对疾病爆发的反应。
best_quote_en: Epidemiologists, meanwhile, took interest in how MMORPGs, unlike mathematical models, could capture individual human responses to disease outbreaks rather than generating assumptions about behavior.
best_quote_zh: 与此同时，流行病学家对MMORPG如何捕捉个人对疾病爆发的反应（而不是生成关于行为的假设）产生了兴趣，这与数学模型不同。

title: A Story About Bypassing Air Canada's In-Flight Network Restrictions
summary_en: The author collaborated with a roommate to bypass Air Canada's in-flight WiFi restrictions, which only allowed free texting. They explored domain self-signing and DNS port masquerading techniques. The first approach was blocked and the second approach worked, ultimately discovering that arbitrary DNS servers and TCP-based DNS requests were not blocked.
summary_zh: 作者与室友合作，试图绕过加拿大航空仅允许免费文本信息的机上WiFi限制。他们探索了域名自签名和DNS端口伪装技术。第一种方法被阻止，第二种方法起作用，最终发现任意DNS服务器和基于TCP的DNS请求未被阻止。
best_quote_en: After all, with such a long journey ahead, I needed something interesting to pass the 12 hours.
best_quote_zh: 毕竟，在如此漫长的旅程中，我需要一些有趣的事情来打发这12个小时。

title: Show HN: Real-time Docker event watcher with multi-channel notifications
summary_en: Docker Events is a lightweight Go service that watches Docker events in real-time and dispatches rich notifications through configurable channels like Slack, Telegram, and Discord. It offers features like real-time event streaming, human-friendly notifications, multi-channel delivery, opt-in filtering, and event grouping to prevent notification spam.
summary_zh: Docker Events是一个轻量级的Go服务，可以实时监控Docker事件，并通过可配置的通道（如Slack、Telegram和Discord）发送丰富的通知。它提供实时事件流、人性化的通知、多通道传递、选择性过滤和事件分组等功能，以防止通知泛滥。
best_quote_en: It is designed to be small, dependable, and easy to extend with new transports or event processing rules.
best_quote_zh: 它的设计目标是小巧、可靠，并且易于扩展新的传输方式或事件处理规则。

title: The Handle Trait
summary_en: The article discusses the naming of a trait for ergonomic ref-counting in Rust. The author proposes the name 'Handle' for a trait that signifies shared ownership or 'entanglement' of data, distinguishing it from simple cloning which creates independent copies. The key idea is to focus on the semantic concept of sharing rather than the operational details of implementation.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了Rust中符合人体工程学的引用计数的trait命名。作者建议使用'Handle'这个名称，来表示数据的所有权共享或“纠缠”，这与创建独立副本的简单克隆不同。核心思想是关注共享的语义概念，而不是实现的运行细节。
best_quote_en: When you clone the Arc, you don’t get a new value – you get back a second handle to the same value.
best_quote_zh: 当你克隆Arc时，你不会得到一个新值，而是会得到指向相同值的第二个句柄。

title: SSH Security: Why You Should Touch to Verify
summary_en: This article emphasizes the importance of touch-verified SSH for enhanced security. It addresses the increasing threat of malware stealing SSH keys and highlights how touch verification, using hardware isolation and physical confirmation, prevents key exfiltration and silent abuse. The article suggests using tools like Secretive on macOS to implement this.
summary_zh: 本文强调了使用触摸验证SSH来增强安全性的重要性。它指出了恶意软件窃取SSH密钥的日益增长的威胁，并强调了触摸验证如何通过硬件隔离和物理确认来防止密钥泄露和静默滥用。 文章建议在macOS上使用Secretive等工具来实现这一点。
best_quote_en: Touch-verified SSH is an inexpensive, low-impact intervention that helps.
best_quote_zh: 触摸验证的SSH是一种廉价，低影响的干预措施，可以提供帮助。

title: Can an LLM Be a Black-Box Optimizer?
summary_en: This article explores using Large Language Models (LLMs) as black-box optimizers, testing their ability to minimize the Rosenbrock function. The author compares an LLM optimizer to Nelder-Mead and Bayesian optimization, assessing their performance based on the minimum objective function found within a budget of 20 function evaluations. The initial evaluation revealed a tendency for the LLM to guess the minimum at the origin or (1,1), requiring adjustments to the prompt.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了使用大型语言模型（LLM）作为黑盒优化器，测试其最小化 Rosenbrock 函数的能力。作者将 LLM 优化器与 Nelder-Mead 和贝叶斯优化进行比较，根据在 20 次函数评估预算内找到的最小目标函数来评估它们的性能。初步评估显示 LLM 倾向于猜测最小值在原点或 (1,1)，因此需要调整提示。
best_quote_en: What if we could take the intuition that is latent in a large language model (LLM) to guide an optimization process?
best_quote_zh: 如果我们能利用大型语言模型（LLM）中潜在的直觉来指导优化过程，会怎么样？

title: I Triggered a Government Investigation into Microsoft (Update)
summary_en: Trevor Nestor triggered a government investigation into Microsoft for wrongful terminations, ADA noncompliance, and whistleblower retaliation. Despite facing criticism, he decided to double down on going public, encouraged by others who experienced similar issues. He believes that exposing corporate misconduct is a victory in itself, holding Microsoft accountable for labor law violations.
summary_zh: Trevor Nestor因不当解雇、违反 ADA 规定和举报人报复等问题，触发了对微软的政府调查。尽管面临批评，但他决定加倍公开此事，受到其他有类似经历的人的鼓励。他认为，揭露公司的不当行为本身就是一种胜利，可以追究微软违反劳动法的责任。
best_quote_en: The way I see it, even if gatekeepers through formal channels fail to hold Microsoft accountable, by going public and resisting fear and intimidation, I've already won.
best_quote_zh: 在我看来，即使正式渠道的把关人未能追究微软的责任，通过公开此事并抵制恐惧和恐吓，我已经赢了。

title: More Speculations on Arenas in C++
summary_en: This article discusses arena allocation in C++ and how recent C++ standards, particularly C++20, affect memory management and object lifetimes. It revisits the author's previous arena implementation, highlighting potential issues with pointer provenance and the importance of using array new for proper lifetime management. The author also touches on the allowance of starting new lifetimes on top of technically still-alive objects within the arena.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了C++中的arena内存分配，以及最新的C++标准，尤其是C++20，如何影响内存管理和对象生命周期。作者回顾了之前实现的arena，强调了指针来源的潜在问题，以及使用数组new进行正确的生命周期管理的重要性。作者还提到了在arena中，允许在技术上仍然存在的对象之上开始新的生命周期。
best_quote_en: Assignment without a lifetime is invalid. Pointer casts are that much more suspicious in C++, and due to lifetime semantics, in many cases indicate incorrect code.
best_quote_zh: 没有生命周期的赋值是无效的。在C++中，指针转换更令人怀疑，并且由于生命周期语义，在许多情况下表明代码不正确。

title: Video of Kristi Noem blaming Democrats for shutdown rolling out at airports
summary_en: The Trump administration plans to display a video at US airports blaming Democrats for TSA workers' unpaid status during the government shutdown. The video features Kristi Noem, who states that Democrats in Congress refuse to fund the government, impacting TSA operations and employees. This politicizes travelers' airport experience.
summary_zh: 特朗普政府计划在美国机场播放一段视频，将政府关闭期间运输安全管理局（TSA）员工未获得报酬归咎于民主党。视频中，Kristi Noem 声称国会中的民主党人拒绝为政府提供资金，影响了 TSA 的运营和员工。此举将政治带入了旅客的机场体验。
best_quote_en: Democrats in Congress refuse to fund the federal government, and because of this, many of our operations are impacted, and most of our TSA employees are working without pay.
best_quote_zh: 国会中的民主党人拒绝为联邦政府提供资金，因此，我们的许多运营都受到了影响，我们的大多数 TSA 员工都在无薪工作。

title: Run Express server in the browser (2016)
summary_en: The article discusses techniques to improve web application loading times. It explores using ServiceWorker to intercept HTML and display cached content for instant loading. It also covers server-side rendering as an alternative solution, highlighting its performance benefits and SEO advantages. Finally, it connects Express server with ServiceWorker.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了提高Web应用程序加载速度的技术。它探讨了使用ServiceWorker拦截HTML并显示缓存内容以实现即时加载的方法。文章还介绍了服务端渲染作为另一种解决方案，强调了其性能优势和搜索引擎优化优势。最后，将Express服务器与ServiceWorker联系起来。
best_quote_en: The instant page content achieved!
best_quote_zh: 实现了即时页面内容！

title: Scientists may have spotted 'wind' blowing from the Milky Way's black hole
summary_en: Scientists have potentially detected a 'wind' emanating from Sagittarius A*, the supermassive black hole at the Milky Way's center. This wind is evidenced by a cone-shaped gap in the surrounding gas, suggesting the black hole ejects matter, though less dramatically than other black holes like Centaurus A.
summary_zh: 科学家们可能已经探测到来自银河系中心超大质量黑洞人马座 A* 的“风”。这种风的证据是周围气体中一个锥形的间隙，表明该黑洞会喷射物质，尽管不如半人马座 A 等其他黑洞那么引人注目。
best_quote_en: Most supermassive black holes don’t just swallow up matter, they eject it, sometimes in spectacular jets of super heated plasma.
best_quote_zh: 大多数超大质量黑洞不仅仅吞噬物质，它们还会喷射物质，有时会以壮观的超热等离子体喷流的形式喷射出来。

title: Major IQ differences in twins due to schooling, challenging decades of research
summary_en: A new analysis of twin studies suggests that differences in schooling significantly contribute to IQ gaps between identical twins raised apart. When twins have similar education, their IQ scores are nearly as alike as twins raised together.  However, when schooling varies greatly, IQ differences resemble those of unrelated individuals, challenging previous conclusions about the dominance of genetics in intelligence.
summary_zh: 一项新的双胞胎研究分析表明，教育差异显著影响了分开抚养的同卵双胞胎之间的智商差距。当双胞胎接受相似的教育时，他们的智商分数几乎与一起长大的双胞胎一样接近。然而，当教育差异很大时，智商差异类似于无关个体，挑战了先前关于遗传在智力中占主导地位的结论。
best_quote_en: When these twins receive similar educations, their IQ scores are nearly as alike as identical twins raised together, but when their schooling is very different, their IQs can be as dissimilar as those of unrelated strangers.
best_quote_zh: 当这些双胞胎接受相似的教育时，他们的智商分数几乎与一起长大的同卵双胞胎一样接近，但是当他们的教育非常不同时，他们的智商可能与无关的陌生人一样不同。

title: Airbnb: Agent-in-the-Loop: Data Flywheel for LLM-Based Customer Support
summary_en: This paper introduces Agent-in-the-Loop (AITL), a data flywheel framework for continuously improving LLM-based customer support. AITL integrates annotations directly into operations, reducing retraining cycles. A pilot program showed improvements in retrieval accuracy, generation quality, and agent adoption rates, demonstrating the effectiveness of human feedback loops in refining LLM systems.
summary_zh: 本文介绍了一种Agent-in-the-Loop (AITL)框架，这是一个数据飞轮，用于持续改进基于LLM的客户支持系统。AITL将注释直接集成到运营中，从而减少了再培训周期。一个试点项目表明，检索准确率、生成质量和代理采用率均有所提高，证明了人工反馈循环在优化LLM系统中的有效性。
best_quote_en: These results underscore the effectiveness of embedding human feedback loops directly into operational workflows to continuously refine LLM-based customer support system.
best_quote_zh: 这些结果强调了将人工反馈循环直接嵌入到运营工作流程中以持续优化基于LLM的客户支持系统的有效性。

title: The work of AI today is writing a Rust parser for a 20-year-old sensor
summary_en: The article argues that the real frontier of AI lies not in bigger models and more parameters but in improving the connection to physical data. It highlights the unglamorous but crucial work of parsing data from sensors and building the physical stack, which involves dealing with raw, real-world data. This is where a true competitive advantage can be found.
summary_zh: 文章认为，人工智能的真正前沿不在于更大的模型和更多的参数，而在于改善与物理数据的连接。它强调了解析传感器数据和构建物理堆栈这项不光彩但至关重要的工作，这项工作涉及处理原始的、真实世界的数据。真正的竞争优势可以从这里找到。
best_quote_en: The physical stack is 90 percent of the effort and 0 percent of the glamour. And it's where the truth lives.
best_quote_zh: 物理堆栈占据了 90% 的努力，却没有一丝光彩。而真相就存在于此。

title: Flattening the stack, reducing the complexity of a JavaScript runtime
summary_en: The article appears to be a placeholder or an incomplete page from a GitHub repository related to 'librdx' by 'gritzko'. It indicates potential issues with loading content and doesn't provide meaningful information for summarization beyond a project title and author.
summary_zh: 这篇文章似乎是一个占位符或来自GitHub仓库'gritzko/librdx'的不完整页面。它表明加载内容时可能出现问题，除了项目标题和作者之外，没有提供有意义的信息。
best_quote_en: Uh oh! There was an error while loading. Please reload this page.
best_quote_zh: 糟糕！加载时出错。请重新加载此页面。

title: Go Subtleties You May Not Know
summary_en: This article highlights several lesser-known features and subtleties of the Go programming language, covering topics such as ranging over integers, renaming packages, constraining generic function signatures, index-based string interpolation, the 'time.After' function, embedding files, UTF-8 gotchas with 'len()', nil interfaces, invoking methods on nil values, and variable references with ranging over maps.
summary_zh: 本文重点介绍Go编程语言的一些鲜为人知的特性和微妙之处，涵盖了整数范围，重命名包，约束泛型函数签名，基于索引的字符串插值，“time.After”函数，嵌入文件，带“len()”的UTF-8陷阱，Nil接口，在Nil值上调用方法以及在使用map进行范围限定的变量引用等主题。
best_quote_en: One of the best ways to learn something new is to write down something you’ve learned about it regularly.
best_quote_zh: 学习新事物最好的方法之一就是定期写下你学到的东西。

title: Hackers targeted JLR months before cyber attack that halted production
summary_en: Hackers targeted JLR months before the cyber attack that halted production. The article discusses subscription options for accessing the Financial Times for global news, expert analysis, and other features.
summary_zh: 黑客在导致捷豹路虎（JLR）停产的网络攻击发生前几个月就盯上了该公司。文章主要介绍了订阅《金融时报》以获取全球新闻、专家分析和其他功能的选项。
best_quote_en: Stay informed with global news & in-depth analysis.
best_quote_zh: 随时了解全球新闻和深度分析。

title: From Nginx to ngrok: Dogfooding our own website with Traffic Policy
summary_en: ngrok replaced its aging nginx configurations with its own Traffic Policy to fully dogfood its product. The transition involved migrating complex routing rules, redirects, and other configurations to ngrok's more capable API gateway. This showcases ngrok's evolution into a full API gateway solution, simplifying traffic management and improving user experience.
summary_zh: ngrok 使用其自身的流量策略替换了老旧的 nginx 配置，以完全体验自己的产品。 此次迁移涉及将复杂的路由规则、重定向和其他配置迁移到 ngrok 功能更强大的 API 网关。 这展示了 ngrok 演变为完整的 API 网关解决方案，简化了流量管理并改善了用户体验。
best_quote_en: To really embody the spirit of dogfooding, you shouldn't side-step your product gaps and fill those with something else.
best_quote_zh: 为了真正体现内部测试的精神，你不应该回避你产品的不足，并用其他的东西来填补这些空白。

title: Windows 10 support ends on October 14, 2025
summary_en: Windows 10 support ends on October 14, 2025. Upgrade to Windows 11 for security updates and features. Options include upgrading your current PC, buying a new one, or using the Extended Security Updates (ESU) program. Microsoft 365 Apps support on Windows 10 also ends on the same date, but security updates will be provided for three more years.
summary_zh: Windows 10 将于 2025 年 10 月 14 日停止支持。建议升级到 Windows 11 以获得安全更新和新功能。您可以选择升级现有电脑、购买新电脑或使用扩展安全更新（ESU）计划。Microsoft 365 应用对 Windows 10 的支持也将于同日结束，但安全更新将额外提供三年。
best_quote_en: While you could continue to use a PC running Windows 10, without continued software and security updates, your PC will be at a greater risk for viruses and malware.
best_quote_zh: 虽然您可以继续使用运行 Windows 10 的电脑，但如果没有持续的软件和安全更新，您的电脑将面临更大的病毒和恶意软件风险。

title: How one of the longest dinosaur trackways in the world was uncovered in the UK
summary_en: One of the world's longest dinosaur trackways, dating back 166 million years, has been uncovered in an Oxfordshire quarry. The trackways, made by sauropods and megalosaurus, reveal insights into dinosaur behavior, speed, and environment. The 220m trail provides a unique snapshot of prehistoric life in the Jurassic period, offering clues about how these giant creatures moved and interacted.
summary_zh: 在牛津郡的采石场发现了一条世界上最长的恐龙足迹之一，可以追溯到1.66亿年前。这些由蜥脚类恐龙和斑龙留下的足迹，揭示了恐龙的行为、速度和环境。这条220米长的足迹为了解侏罗纪时期的史前生命提供了一个独特的快照，为了解这些巨型生物如何移动和互动提供了线索。
best_quote_en: But with a trackway like this, we've got hundreds of metres of the animal doing its own thing. And it's so important to look at the way animals move freely and naturally, and tracks are the only way we can do that for dinosaurs.
best_quote_zh: 有了这样的足迹，我们可以观察到动物数百米的活动轨迹。观察动物自由和自然移动的方式非常重要，而足迹是我们可以做到这一点的唯一途径。

title: Problem Details for HTTP APIs
summary_en: This document defines a "problem detail" format for HTTP APIs to carry machine-readable error details in HTTP responses. It uses JSON and XML formats to provide finer-grained error information beyond HTTP status codes, allowing API clients to understand the problem and how to resolve it.
summary_zh: 本文定义了一种HTTP API的“问题详情”格式，用于在HTTP响应中携带机器可读的错误详情。它使用JSON和XML格式来提供比HTTP状态码更精细的错误信息，使API客户端能够了解问题以及如何解决它。
best_quote_en: This document defines a "problem detail" as a way to carry machine-readable details of errors in a HTTP response to avoid the need to define new error response formats for HTTP APIs.
best_quote_zh: 本文定义了一种“问题详情”，作为在HTTP响应中携带机器可读的错误详情的方式，以避免为HTTP API定义新的错误响应格式。

title: Technological Optimism and Appropriate Fear
summary_en: The author reflects on the increasing capabilities of AI systems, moving beyond simple tools to exhibit situational awareness, sparking both technological optimism and appropriate fear. He emphasizes the importance of acknowledging AI's reality and mastering our fears to understand and potentially tame it. Ignoring the reality of AI is a guaranteed losing strategy.
summary_zh: 作者反思了人工智能系统日益增长的能力，这些系统不再是简单的工具，而是展现出情境意识，这既引发了技术乐观主义，也引发了适当的恐惧。他强调了承认人工智能的现实并掌握我们的恐惧来理解并可能驯服它的重要性。忽视人工智能的现实是一种必输的策略。
best_quote_en: But make no mistake: what we are dealing with is a real and mysterious creature, not a simple and predictable machine.
best_quote_zh: 但请不要搞错：我们所面对的是一个真实而神秘的生物，而不是一个简单且可预测的机器。

title: Europe's Digital Sovereignty Paradox – "Chat Control" Update
summary_en: The EU's "Chat Control" proposal, mandating scanning of private communications, faces opposition due to concerns about breaking encryption. European tech companies argue this undermines digital sovereignty by forcing vulnerabilities. Policymakers need to understand encryption's crucial role in secure infrastructure for democracy and national security. A coherent tech strategy is needed to bridge the gap between political vision and technical reality.
summary_zh: 欧盟的“聊天控制”提案，强制扫描私人通信，因担心破坏加密而面临反对。欧洲科技公司认为，这通过强行制造漏洞来破坏数字主权。政策制定者需要了解加密在民主和国家安全的安全基础设施中的关键作用。需要一项连贯的技术战略来弥合政治愿景和技术现实之间的差距。
best_quote_en: When Denmark's Justice Minister suggested that the "completely misguided perception" is that everyone has a right to secure communication, he revealed the fundamental gap: policymakers who don't understand that secure infrastructure is the core of today's Internet backbone, not just for the pure sake of democracy (I swear it hurts to have to explain this), but also for the existential security of European countries.
best_quote_zh: 当丹麦司法部长暗示“完全错误的观念”是每个人都有权进行安全通信时，他揭示了根本差距：政策制定者不明白安全基础设施是当今互联网骨干的核心，不仅是为了纯粹的民主（我发誓解释这一点让我感到痛苦），而且也为了欧洲国家的存在安全。

title: Sweater
summary_en: A sweater is a knitted or crocheted garment with long sleeves that covers the upper body. Also called a pullover, jumper, or jersey, sweaters can be made from wool, cotton, or synthetic fibers. They come in various designs, including V-neck, turtleneck, and crew neck, and can be cardigans with an open front.
summary_zh: 毛衣是一种针织或钩织的服装，通常有长袖，覆盖身体的上半部分。也称为套头衫、跳线衫或运动衫，毛衣可以用羊毛、棉或合成纤维制成。它们有多种设计，包括V领、高领和圆领，也可以是开襟衫。
best_quote_en: Sweaters that are more tightly fitted or have a soft drape may conform well to the body without requiring tailoring necessary in a woven garment such as darts, flares, and gores.
best_quote_zh: 更贴身或具有柔软悬垂感的毛衣可以很好地贴合身体，而无需像飞镖、喇叭口和三角形布等梭织服装所需的剪裁。

title: ComfyUI on Nvidia DGX Spark
summary_en: NVIDIA released DGX Spark, a small form factor computer with a Grace Blackwell Superchip and 128GB unified memory. It supports ComfyUI well and can run large models. While not as performant as a desktop 5090, its unified memory allows for workloads that exceed high-end desktops. Benchmarks will be available in a future post.
summary_zh: NVIDIA发布了DGX Spark，一款小尺寸计算机, 具有Grace Blackwell Superchip和128GB统一内存。它良好支持ComfyUI，可以运行大型模型。虽然性能不及桌面5090，但其统一内存允许处理超出高端桌面的工作负载。基准测试将在未来的文章中提供。
best_quote_en: Performance wise it doesn’t beat a full desktop with a 5090 but it can run models and workloads that are too large for even high-end desktop systems.
best_quote_zh: 性能方面，它比不上配备5090的完整桌面电脑，但它可以运行即使是高端桌面系统也无法处理的大型模型和工作负载。

title: Why Your Brain and Mine Agree on What We See
summary_en: A study shows that while individual brains respond differently to images, the relationships between neural responses are consistent across people. This shared relational pattern enables similar perception of the world. Understanding this could improve AI models by mirroring human cognition.
summary_zh: 一项研究表明，尽管个体大脑对图像的反应不同，但神经反应之间的关系在人与人之间具有一致性。 这种共享的关系模式使得对世界的感知相似。 理解这一点可以通过模仿人类认知来改进人工智能模型。
best_quote_en: This relational representation may be the brain’s way of organizing information so that all humans can understand the world in a similar way, even when the underlying neural coding differs.
best_quote_zh: 这种关系表示可能是大脑组织信息的方式，以便所有人都可以以相似的方式理解世界，即使底层神经编码不同。

title: Elixir 1.9.0 Release
summary_en: Elixir 1.19.0 is released with enhancements and bug fixes. Key updates include improvements to Access, Base, Calendar, Code, Enum, Inspect, IO.ANSI, Kernel, Macro, Module, OptionParser, Protocol, Regex, Registry, String, ExUnit, IEx, Logger, and Mix. Bug fixes address issues in Code, DateTime, Enum, File, Inspect, Kernel, Protocol, Regex, Stream, URI, and ExUnit.
summary_zh: Elixir 1.19.0 版本发布，包含多项增强和错误修复。主要更新包括改进了 Access、Base、Calendar、Code、Enum、Inspect、IO.ANSI、Kernel、Macro、Module、OptionParser、Protocol、Regex、Registry、String、ExUnit、IEx、Logger 和 Mix。修复的错误涉及 Code、DateTime、Enum、File、Inspect、Kernel、Protocol、Regex、Stream、URI 和 ExUnit。
best_quote_en: Do not automatically load modules after their compilation, guaranteeing a more consistent compile time experience and drastically improving compilation times.
best_quote_zh: 在模块编译后不再自动加载，从而保证更一致的编译体验并大幅缩短编译时间。

title: Netherlands' renewables drive putting pressure on its power grid
summary_en: The Netherlands' rapid shift to renewable energy, particularly wind and solar power, is straining the country's electricity grid, leading to congestion and power cuts. Despite leading in solar panel adoption, the grid, designed for large gas-fired power plants, struggles to handle the decentralized renewable energy sources. Significant investment is needed to upgrade the grid and avoid hampering economic growth.
summary_zh: 荷兰迅速转向可再生能源，特别是风能和太阳能，给该国的电力网络带来了压力，导致拥堵和停电。尽管在太阳能电池板的采用方面处于领先地位，但该电网是为大型燃气发电厂设计的，难以处理分散的可再生能源。需要大量投资来升级电网，避免阻碍经济增长。
best_quote_en: "Grid congestion is putting the future of the Dutch chemical industry at risk… while in other countries it will be easier to invest."
best_quote_zh: “电网拥堵正在使荷兰化学工业的未来面临风险……而在其他国家，投资会更容易。”

title: Meta partners up with Arm to scale AI efforts
summary_en: Meta and Arm are partnering to enhance Meta's AI systems using Arm's Neoverse platform, optimized for AI in the cloud. This multi-year partnership aims to efficiently scale AI innovation to Meta's billions of users, focusing on low-power deployments and efficiency. Meta is also vastly expanding its data center network to support AI services.
summary_zh: Meta与Arm合作，利用Arm的Neoverse平台增强Meta的AI系统，该平台针对云中的AI进行了优化。这项多年合作旨在有效地将AI创新扩展到Meta的数十亿用户，重点关注低功耗部署和效率。Meta还在大力扩展其数据中心网络，以支持AI服务。
best_quote_en: AI’s next era will be defined by delivering efficiency at scale.
best_quote_zh: 人工智能的下一个时代将通过大规模地提供效率来定义。

title: MNT September 2025 Update
summary_en: MNT's September 2025 update covers the MNT Mini Campaign closing on Crowd Supply, developments on the MNT Quasar processor module and MNT Reform Next, firmware updates for MNT Pocket Reform, Desserto vegan leather adoption and order fulfillment updates. Improved USB 3.0 performance and battery pack design for MNT Reform Next are highlighted. Firmware bugs are fixed, and shipment dates are provided.
summary_zh: MNT 2025年9月更新涵盖了MNT Mini Campaign在Crowd Supply上的结束、MNT Quasar处理器模块和MNT Reform Next的开发，MNT Pocket Reform的固件更新，Desserto纯素皮革的应用以及订单履行更新。重点介绍了MNT Reform Next改进的USB 3.0性能和电池组设计。固件错误已修复，并提供了发货日期。
best_quote_en: This more modular design allows for easier improvements and alternative pack geometries in the future.
best_quote_zh: 这种更模块化的设计允许将来更容易地进行改进和实现替代的电池组几何形状。

title: Mill as an Alternative Android Build Tool
summary_en: Mill is presented as an alternative to Gradle for Android builds, offering ease of use and learning. It supports complex project setups like Jetpack Compose and Android Native. Mill's object-oriented modules provide transparency and hackability, enabling developers to debug and tweak the build process themselves.
summary_zh: Mill被提出作为Gradle的替代品，用于Android构建，提供了易用性和学习性。它支持复杂的项目设置，如Jetpack Compose和Android Native。 Mill的面向对象模块提供了透明性和可破解性，使开发人员能够自行调试和调整构建过程。
best_quote_en: If something doesn’t work, you don’t need to wait for a plugin update, you can open the task in your IDE, see the source, and tweak it yourself.
best_quote_zh: 如果某些东西不起作用，你不需要等待插件更新，你可以在IDE中打开任务，查看源代码，然后自己调整它。

title: Jj Part 4: Configuration
summary_en: This article discusses customizing the Jj version control system through configuration. It covers basic configurations like setting name and email, diff formatters, diff editors, and merge editors. It also explains how to configure default subcommands and revsets. Additionally, the article explores advanced customization options like using custom templates, revset aliases, and template aliases to extend or replace built-in functionality in jj.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了通过配置自定义Jj版本控制系统。它涵盖了基本配置，如设置名称和电子邮件、diff格式化器、diff编辑器和合并编辑器。它还解释了如何配置默认子命令和revset。此外，本文还探讨了高级自定义选项，例如使用自定义模板、revset别名和模板别名来扩展或替换jj中的内置功能。
best_quote_en: Just like git, jj offers tiers of configuration that layer on top of one another. Every setting can be set for a single repo, for the current user, or globally for the entire system.
best_quote_zh: 就像Git一样，jj提供了层层叠加的配置层级。每个设置都可以针对单个仓库、当前用户或全局系统进行设置。

title: The Art of Scaling Reinforcement Learning Compute for LLMs [Meta]
summary_en: This paper presents a large-scale study on scaling reinforcement learning (RL) compute for large language models (LLMs). It defines framework for analyzing and predicting RL scaling, identifies key factors affecting performance and proposes a best-practice recipe, ScaleRL, demonstrating its effectiveness at 100,000 GPU-hours. The work provides a scientific framework and a practical recipe for predictable RL training.
summary_zh: 本文针对大型语言模型（LLM），提出了一种扩展强化学习（RL）计算的大规模研究。它定义了一个分析和预测RL扩展的框架，确定了影响性能的关键因素，并提出了ScaleRL的最佳实践方案，证明了其在100,000 GPU-hours上的有效性。这项工作为可预测的RL训练提供了一个科学的框架和实践方案。
best_quote_en: Our work provides both a scientific framework for analyzing scaling in RL and a practical recipe that brings RL training closer to the predictability long achieved in pre-training.
best_quote_zh: 我们的工作既提供了一个分析RL扩展的科学框架，又提供了一个实践方案，使RL训练更接近于预训练长期以来实现的可预测性。

title: Ask HN: What background color among white or black preferrable for websites?
desc:
These days, it is very common to see websites with dark backgrounds.

I ran a poll within my company and it seems like many love the dark background of our Website.

Www.hexarocket.com

But while speaking to a few folks within my professional network, they say it's better to choose the light background.

Does one really care the background color of a website ?

Or one would just skip reading because of the background color ?

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45625674

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: The author is asking whether it is preferable to use a white or black background for websites. A poll within the author's company showed that many people loved the dark background, but some people in the author's professional network preferred the light background. The author wonders if people really care about the background color of a website or if they would simply skip reading because of it.
summary_zh: 作者提问：网站背景颜色选择白色还是黑色更好？公司内部调查显示很多人喜欢深色背景，但作者职业网络中的一些人更喜欢浅色背景。作者想知道人们是否真的关心网站的背景颜色，或者是否会因为背景颜色而直接跳过阅读。
best_quote_en: Does one really care the background color of a website ? Or one would just skip reading because of the background color ?
best_quote_zh: 人们真的关心网站的背景颜色吗？或者是否会因为背景颜色而直接跳过阅读？

title: What to do after detecting a signal from extraterrestrial intelligence
summary_en: This paper discusses the progress towards a new version of SETI post-detection protocols by the IAA SETI Committee. The protocols, initially formulated in 1989, have been updated to reflect advancements in SETI research, international participation, and the evolving information environment. A revised Declaration of Principles was presented at IAC 2024, with ongoing refinements based on community feedback.
summary_zh: 本文讨论了国际宇航科学院（IAA）SETI委员会在SETI探测后协议新版本方面的进展。该协议最初于1989年制定，现已更新，以反映SETI研究的进展、国际参与以及不断发展的信息环境。修订后的原则声明已在2024年国际宇航大会上提出，并根据社区反馈不断进行改进。
best_quote_en: The Group recognises the living document nature of the protocols, which will require ongoing refinement to remain relevant and effective in a rapidly changing world.
best_quote_zh: 该小组认识到这些协议是动态文件，需要不断完善，才能在快速变化的世界中保持相关性和有效性。

title: Kerr cell shutter to measure the speed of light
summary_en: A Kerr cell shutter is a high-speed photographic shutter using the Kerr effect in substances like nitrobenzene to achieve nanosecond shutter speeds. It's been replaced by KTN and barium titanate due to toxicity. It was also used in the 1920s-40s to measure the speed of light by diverting a light beam and measuring the time difference.
summary_zh: 克尔盒快门是一种高速摄影快门，利用硝基苯等物质的克尔效应实现纳秒级的快门速度。 由于毒性，它已被KTN和钛酸钡取代。 在1920年代至40年代，它也被用于测量光速，方法是转移光束并测量时间差。
best_quote_en: The cell makes use of the Kerr effect, in which the nitrobenzene becomes birefringent under the influence of the electric field.
best_quote_zh: 该装置利用了克尔效应，在这种效应中，硝基苯在电场的影响下会发生双折射。

title: Testing tricky network services with Linux Namespaces
summary_en: This article discusses using Linux network namespaces, veth pairs, and bridges to create isolated, scriptable test labs for network services like DHCP. It focuses on the DHCP load balancer (dhcplb) and demonstrates how to test relay and server/broadcast topologies on Linux and macOS using Lima. The approach allows for testing on local machines and in CI/CD pipelines, ensuring reliable testing without dedicated hardware.
summary_zh: 本文探讨了如何使用Linux网络命名空间，veth对和网桥来为DHCP等网络服务创建隔离的、可脚本化的测试环境。重点介绍了DHCP负载均衡器（dhcplb），并演示了如何在Linux和macOS上使用Lima测试中继和服务器/广播拓扑。该方法允许在本地机器和CI/CD管道上进行测试，确保在没有专用硬件的情况下进行可靠的测试。
best_quote_en: By combining these three tools, we can build any network topology we can imagine, all on a single Linux host.
best_quote_zh: 通过结合这三种工具，我们可以在单个Linux主机上构建我们能想到的任何网络拓扑。

title: I built an AI that replaces spreadsheets
summary_en: This article showcases a dashboard designed to replace spreadsheets for financial overview. It tracks income, expenses, and balance, allowing users to add transactions, categorize them, and view expense breakdowns through various charts. It also provides options to share and export data.
summary_zh: 本文展示了一个旨在取代电子表格的财务概览仪表板。它可以跟踪收入、支出和余额，允许用户添加交易、对其进行分类，并通过各种图表查看支出细目。它还提供了共享和导出数据的选项。
best_quote_en: No transactions yet. Add your first transaction above!
best_quote_zh: 尚无交易。请在上方添加您的第一笔交易！

title: Show HN: Nova: open-source solution for CAD file conflicts
desc:
Hey HN,

A friend at a hardware startup mentioned how their engineering team struggles with CAD file conflicts as PDM solutions are not affordable. Multiple engineers opening the same SolidWorks part = corrupted files and lost work.

I was motivated and started building Nova. Nova is a open source file locking system, designed to support multiple CAD softwares with real time locking and live dashboard to keep design engineers in sync.

Nova is built with python and Next.js.

Get started with -

  git clone https://github.com/agg111/nova
  cd nova
  pip install -r requirements.txt
  nova start
  nova --help (for more commands)
Open http://localhost:3000 in browser

I am looking for early users to get some feedback and learn about more features or bottlenecks that mechanical design teams currently face.

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45632630

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
summary_en: Nova is an open-source CAD file locking system designed for team collaboration. It automatically manages file locks for CAD applications like SolidWorks and AutoCAD, preventing conflicts and ensuring seamless workflow. Key features include intelligent locking, a web dashboard for real-time monitoring, zero configuration, and support for major CAD applications.
summary_zh: Nova是一个开源的CAD文件锁定系统，专为团队协作设计。它可以自动管理SolidWorks和AutoCAD等CAD应用程序的文件锁定，防止冲突，确保工作流程顺畅。主要功能包括智能锁定、用于实时监控的Web仪表板、零配置以及对主要CAD应用程序的支持。
best_quote_en: Nova automatically manages file locks for CAD applications (SolidWorks, AutoCAD, Inventor, etc.) to prevent conflicts in team environments.
best_quote_zh: Nova自动管理CAD应用程序（如SolidWorks、AutoCAD、Inventor等）的文件锁，以防止团队环境中的冲突。
